EQT_2024Q3_2288.original_quote: I'm interested in your current assessment of AI and data demand related to data centers.
EQT_2024Q3_2288.summary: The company is evaluating the demand for AI and data in relation to their data centers, indicating a focus on leveraging AI for data management and operational efficiency.

EPAM_2025Q3_2286.speaker: Jason Peterson
EPAM_2025Q3_2286.original_quote: It’s somewhat challenging to quantify precisely, but we have seen strong sequential improvement in revenues for GenAI native services, continuing to grow by double digits.
EPAM_2025Q3_2286.summary: EPAM is experiencing strong sequential revenue growth from its GenAI native services, indicating a successful integration and demand for their AI-driven offerings.

EPAM_2025Q3_2285.speaker: Antonio Jaramillo
EPAM_2025Q3_2285.original_quote: What is the growth of your GenAI-like revenue?
EPAM_2025Q3_2285.summary: The company is being asked about the growth of its revenue related to Generative AI, indicating a focus on AI-driven services or solutions.

EPAM_2025Q3_2279.speaker: Balazs Fejes
EPAM_2025Q3_2279.original_quote: The first was First Derivative, where we had a line of business which was in business services; that's where we really went after that acquisition with the pieces that we could automate with Agentic AI, the KYC and fin crime elements of their business.
EPAM_2025Q3_2279.summary: EPAM is utilizing Agentic AI to automate key components of their business services, specifically focusing on KYC (Know Your Customer) and financial crime elements following their acquisition of First Derivative.

EQT_2025Q1_2291.speaker: Toby Rice
EQT_2025Q1_2291.original_quote: But now we've got a more bullish opportunity happening in our backyard with this AI data center thing.
EQT_2025Q1_2291.summary: EQT is expressing optimism about a new opportunity related to an AI data center, indicating a potential strategic shift towards leveraging AI in their operations.

EQT_2025Q2_2293.speaker: Toby Rice
EQT_2025Q2_2293.original_quote: And one of the other things that I think is important to note is the cluster effect of these AI data centers and these ecosystems, I think, will only continue to build on themselves.
EQT_2025Q2_2293.summary: The executive highlights the growing impact of AI data centers and ecosystems, suggesting that their interconnectedness will enhance overall performance and capabilities.

EFX_2023Q4_2294.speaker: Mark Begor
EFX_2023Q4_2294.original_quote: By the end of 2024, we expect to have about 90% of our revenue in the new Equifax cloud with the vast majority of new models and scores being built using Equifax AI.
EFX_2023Q4_2294.summary: Equifax is transitioning to a new cloud infrastructure where they anticipate that 90% of their revenue will come from this platform, with most new models and scores developed using Equifax's AI technology.

EQT_2025Q2_2292.speaker: Toby Rice
EQT_2025Q2_2292.original_quote: The project has secured a partner to build a co-located data center facility to support AI infrastructure, contemplating several phases of development beginning in 2027 and ramping through 2028, providing significant upstream growth optionality for EQT to meet increasing demand.
EQT_2025Q2_2292.summary: EQT is collaborating with a partner to construct a co-located data center facility aimed at supporting AI infrastructure, which is expected to enhance their upstream growth capabilities in response to rising demand.

EQT_2024Q3_2290.speaker: Dave Deckelbaum
EQT_2024Q3_2290.original_quote: As we think about AI and its commercial impact to EQT, you talked about benefiting from this directly.
EQT_2024Q3_2290.summary: EQT is considering the commercial impact of AI on its operations and is exploring ways to benefit from it directly.

EFX_2025Q3_2296.speaker: Mark Begor
EFX_2025Q3_2296.original_quote: Our strategy is to transition from solely providing data and analytics to becoming an essential partner in AI-powered decision intelligence.
EFX_2025Q3_2296.summary: EFX is shifting its strategy to focus on becoming a key partner in AI-powered decision intelligence, moving beyond just data and analytics services.

EFX_2025Q4_2297.speaker: Mark Begor
EFX_2025Q4_2297.original_quote: In 2025, with 90% of our revenue in the new Equifax cloud, we pivoted from building to leveraging the cloud and accelerating our use of AI in new products.
EFX_2025Q4_2297.summary: Equifax is leveraging AI in new products as part of its strategy to utilize its cloud infrastructure, which now accounts for 90% of its revenue.

EFX_2025Q4_2298.speaker: John Gamble
EFX_2025Q4_2298.original_quote: Diversified markets revenue is expected to improve versus 2025 and grow mid-single digits year to year, benefiting from accelerating NPI, including Twin indicator and total income-based products and share gains, as they accelerate leveraging Ignite AI capabilities.
EFX_2025Q4_2298.summary: EFX is leveraging Ignite AI capabilities to enhance their new product introductions (NPI) and total income-based products, which is expected to contribute to revenue growth in diversified markets.

EFX_2023Q4_2295.speaker: Mark Begor
EFX_2023Q4_2295.original_quote: We are confident that the differentiated data assets in our new single data fabric and the use of EFX AI and machine learning, combined with our leading businesses, will result in higher growth, increased margins, and greater free cash flow in the future.
EFX_2023Q4_2295.summary: EFX is leveraging its AI and machine learning capabilities within a new single data fabric to enhance its data assets, aiming to drive higher growth and increased margins.

EFX_2025Q4_2301.speaker: Mark Begor
EFX_2025Q4_2301.original_quote: There's substantial productivity gains of $75 million expected in the next few years from AI application in our operations.
EFX_2025Q4_2301.summary: EFX expects to achieve substantial productivity gains of $75 million in the coming years through the application of AI in its operations.

EFX_2025Q4_2302.speaker: Mark Begor
EFX_2025Q4_2302.original_quote: We're guiding on margin expansion of 75 basis points, reflecting the operational leverage of the business and some CI actions we’re taking, driven by AI.
EFX_2025Q4_2302.summary: EFX is leveraging AI to drive operational improvements that contribute to margin expansion, indicating a focus on efficiency and cost management through AI-driven initiatives.

EFX_2025Q4_2303.speaker: Andrew Steinerman
EFX_2025Q4_2303.original_quote: Are they utilizing more or less in terms of the value given the AI integration?
EFX_2025Q4_2303.summary: The company is evaluating the impact of AI integration on the value of their services, suggesting a focus on measuring effectiveness and efficiency.

EFX_2025Q4_2299.speaker: Mark Begor
EFX_2025Q4_2299.original_quote: On the left side of the slide, you see our updated EFX 2028 strategic priorities, which are principally consistent with our prior framework but updated to reflect our drive to accelerate our use of AI both internally and externally to drive efficiencies and cost savings and bring new improved produc
EFX_2025Q4_2299.summary: EFX is focusing on accelerating the use of AI both internally and externally to enhance efficiencies, reduce costs, and improve their product offerings.

EQT_2024Q3_2289.speaker: Toby Rice
EQT_2024Q3_2289.original_quote: Some of the real-time data that we're looking at because this is the million-dollar question is AI, people know power generation is coming.
EQT_2024Q3_2289.summary: EQT is exploring the use of AI in analyzing real-time data related to power generation, indicating a focus on leveraging AI for operational insights in the oil and gas sector.

EQIX_2023Q1_2308.speaker: Jon Atkin
EQIX_2023Q1_2308.original_quote: And then if I can follow up on AI.
EQIX_2023Q1_2308.summary: The speaker is inquiring about EQIX's involvement or strategy regarding AI, but no specific details are provided.

EQIX_2023Q1_2307.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q1_2307.original_quote: We're also seeing the unique breadth of our product portfolio across retail colo, interconnection services, xScale, and digital services resonate strongly with customers as they embrace rapidly emerging opportunities in AI.
EQIX_2023Q1_2307.summary: EQIX is highlighting the strong customer response to its diverse product offerings, particularly in the context of the growing opportunities presented by AI.

EFX_2025Q4_2304.speaker: Mark Begor
EFX_2025Q4_2304.original_quote: We have a macro trend where customers are looking for more data to support their decision-making, and we are leveraging our AI to deliver these solutions, thus creating higher demand for our data.
EFX_2025Q4_2304.summary: EFX is leveraging AI to enhance their data offerings, responding to a macro trend where customers seek more data for decision-making support, which is driving higher demand for their solutions.

EFX_2025Q4_2305.speaker: John Gamble
EFX_2025Q4_2305.original_quote: We expect to sustain margins and growth, further benefiting from the adoption of AI advancements in our operating environment.
EFX_2025Q4_2305.summary: EFX is discussing the positive impact of AI advancements on their operating environment, which they expect will help sustain margins and growth.

EFX_2025Q4_2306.speaker: Mark Begor
EFX_2025Q4_2306.original_quote: To summarize, we view both our proprietary datasets and our novel AI applications as core to our growth strategy moving forward with a strong focus on enhancing our service delivery.
EFX_2025Q4_2306.summary: EFX is emphasizing the importance of its proprietary datasets and novel AI applications as central to its growth strategy, particularly in enhancing service delivery.

EFX_2025Q4_2300.speaker: Jeff Meuler
EFX_2025Q4_2300.original_quote: Mark, you've been front-footed on AI, both from a product and productivity perspective, and it sounds like you also have an AgenTeq AI platform in-house.
EFX_2025Q4_2300.summary: EFX is leveraging its AgenTeq AI platform to enhance both product offerings and internal productivity, indicating a strategic focus on AI integration.

EQIX_2023Q1_2309.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q1_2309.original_quote: I think it's a little early to tell, but we have seen – it's interesting because ChatGPT has created a media frenzy around AI.
EQIX_2023Q1_2309.summary: The executive notes that the media attention surrounding ChatGPT has sparked interest in AI, but they believe it is too early to assess its impact on their business.

EQIX_2023Q1_2311.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q1_2311.original_quote: All of those probably represent some level of opportunity for us M&A, and I think as we look at some of the dynamics and opportunities in the market, including AI.
EQIX_2023Q1_2311.summary: The company is considering opportunities related to AI as part of its M&A strategy, indicating a focus on market dynamics influenced by AI developments.

EQIX_2023Q1_2310.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q1_2310.original_quote: And by the way, I think AI will only add fuel to that fire.
EQIX_2023Q1_2310.summary: The executive suggests that AI will significantly enhance the company's growth and operational efficiency, although no specific applications or strategies are mentioned.

EQIX_2023Q2_2312.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q2_2312.original_quote: These secular drivers, combined with an accelerating appetite for companies to rapidly integrate AI into their operations, are driving increased demand for data center capacity as a broad range of service providers extend and scale their global infrastructure to support the clear enterprise commitme
EQIX_2023Q2_2312.summary: EQIX is experiencing increased demand for data center capacity due to the growing need for companies to integrate AI into their operations, highlighting the importance of infrastructure to support AI initiatives.

EQIX_2023Q2_2313.speaker: Ari Klein
EQIX_2023Q2_2313.original_quote: Maybe on the AI front and as it relates to xScale, there are some exceptionally large leases being done with the vast majority of those in the U.S.
EQIX_2023Q2_2313.summary: EQIX is experiencing significant demand for its data center services, particularly related to AI, as evidenced by exceptionally large leases for its xScale facilities in the U.S.

EQIX_2023Q2_2315.speaker: Jonathan Atkin
EQIX_2023Q2_2315.original_quote: And then lastly, I wonder if you're seeing any tailwinds in segments of your cost connect business that you would attribute to AI given that you might expect a little bit of an uptick in connectivity requirements as these training models get spun up.
EQIX_2023Q2_2315.summary: The company is observing an increase in connectivity requirements attributed to the rise of AI training models, which may positively impact their cost connect business.

EQIX_2023Q3_2322.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q3_2322.original_quote: Now regarding AI, we are definitely seeing its impact.
EQIX_2023Q3_2322.summary: The company acknowledges the impact of AI on its operations, though specifics on how AI is being utilized are not provided.

EQIX_2023Q3_2319.speaker: Keith Taylor
EQIX_2023Q3_2319.original_quote: As it relates to AI, sales activity discussed in Charles' remarks, the vast majority of the demand is destined for the Americas footprint.
EQIX_2023Q3_2319.summary: EQIX is experiencing increased sales activity driven by demand for data center services related to AI, particularly in the Americas region.

EQIX_2023Q3_2320.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q3_2320.original_quote: In closing, we continue to see strong demand as customers embrace AI and advance their digital transformation agendas with infrastructure that is more distributed, more cloud connected, and more ecosystem enabled than ever before.
EQIX_2023Q3_2320.summary: EQIX highlights the strong demand from customers leveraging AI to enhance their digital transformation, emphasizing the need for more distributed and cloud-connected infrastructure.

EQIX_2023Q2_2314.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q2_2314.original_quote: AI plays a role in this change, though it's not the only factor.
EQIX_2023Q2_2314.summary: The company acknowledges the role of AI in their operational changes but does not specify how it is being utilized or its impact.

EQIX_2023Q3_2323.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q3_2323.original_quote: Industries that are data-centric or data-intensive are focusing on digital transformation and AI.
EQIX_2023Q3_2323.summary: EQIX highlights the trend of data-centric industries prioritizing digital transformation and AI, indicating a broader market shift towards these technologies.

EQIX_2023Q2_2317.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q2_2317.original_quote: I also believe there may be shifts in the placement of certain data center capacities, especially in hyperscale and AI training sectors, adapting to the availability of power.
EQIX_2023Q2_2317.summary: EQIX is discussing the potential shifts in data center capacities to accommodate the growing demands of hyperscale and AI training sectors, particularly in relation to power availability.

EQIX_2023Q2_2316.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q2_2316.original_quote: We have observed specific cases of interconnection supporting AI.
EQIX_2023Q2_2316.summary: EQIX is highlighting instances where their interconnection services are facilitating AI applications, indicating a focus on supporting AI workloads through their data center infrastructure.

EQIX_2023Q3_2318.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q3_2318.original_quote: A recent Gartner poll found 55% of organizations are in pilot or production mode with generative AI.
EQIX_2023Q3_2318.summary: The company references a Gartner poll indicating that a significant portion of organizations are actively engaging with generative AI, highlighting the growing relevance of AI in the industry.

EQIX_2025Q2_2327.speaker: Adaire Fox-Martin
EQIX_2025Q2_2327.original_quote: At that time, we outlined the opportunities we see in the market across AI, hybrid and multi-cloud, and networking.
EQIX_2025Q2_2327.summary: EQIX is discussing the market opportunities related to AI, hybrid and multi-cloud solutions, and networking, indicating a strategic focus on integrating AI into their service offerings.

EQIX_2025Q2_2328.speaker: Adaire Fox-Martin
EQIX_2025Q2_2328.original_quote: As you mentioned, a very strong position for interconnection this quarter with revenues up 8% year-on-year and of course, contributing overall to the revenue of Equinix 6,200 additions, mostly focused around cloud and AI expansion opportunities with our customers.
EQIX_2025Q2_2328.summary: Equinix is experiencing growth in interconnection revenues, driven by an increase in customer demand for cloud and AI expansion opportunities, with 6,200 new additions this quarter.

EQIX_2023Q3_2326.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q3_2326.original_quote: The landscape for supply and demand in the US is influenced by traditional demand as well as the growing need for hyperscale solutions, particularly for AI training.
EQIX_2023Q3_2326.summary: EQIX is addressing the growing demand for hyperscale solutions driven by AI training, indicating a strategic focus on providing infrastructure that supports AI workloads.

EQIX_2023Q3_2325.speaker: Nick Del Deo
EQIX_2023Q3_2325.original_quote: What do you see as the differences in AI training that encourage you to support those deployments through xScale in the US, especially considering that you previously identified the cloud opportunity as too competitive to pursue?
EQIX_2023Q3_2325.summary: EQIX is discussing its support for AI training deployments through its xScale data centers in the US, indicating a strategic pivot to capitalize on the growing demand for AI infrastructure despite previous hesitations about the competitive cloud market.

EQIX_2023Q3_2321.speaker: Matt Niknam
EQIX_2023Q3_2321.original_quote: And then second question, again, we appreciate all the color on AI.
EQIX_2023Q3_2321.summary: The speaker acknowledges the company's discussion on AI, indicating a focus on its relevance within their operations.

EQIX_2025Q2_2329.speaker: Adaire Fox-Martin
EQIX_2025Q2_2329.original_quote: Secondly, I think that we are seeing from our enterprise customers a larger footprint requirement as they look to embrace the opportunities for their businesses afforded by AI and its capabilities.
EQIX_2025Q2_2329.summary: EQIX is observing an increased demand from enterprise customers for larger data center footprints as they seek to leverage AI opportunities for their businesses.

EQIX_2025Q3_2332.speaker: Adaire Fox-Martin
EQIX_2025Q3_2332.original_quote: This volume reflects continued demand for a wide variety of latency-sensitive AI and non-AI workloads, supporting significantly increased data residency and sovereignty requirements and delivering seamless connectivity to distributed data sources.
EQIX_2025Q3_2332.summary: EQIX is discussing the demand for data center services that support latency-sensitive AI workloads, emphasizing their role in meeting data residency and sovereignty requirements while providing connectivity to distributed data sources.

EQIX_2025Q2_2330.speaker: Adaire Fox-Martin
EQIX_2025Q2_2330.original_quote: But as it relates to the demand for AI and AI-orientated workloads, those use cases focus around a number of topics.
EQIX_2025Q2_2330.summary: EQIX is discussing the demand for AI and AI-oriented workloads, indicating a focus on various use cases related to these technologies.

EQIX_2025Q2_2331.speaker: Adaire Fox-Martin
EQIX_2025Q2_2331.original_quote: Nonetheless, xScale is a vital part of our product continuum, bridging wholesale and large footprint solutions while accommodating the increasing demand in both hyperscaler and retail capacities in an AI-driven environment.
EQIX_2025Q2_2331.summary: EQIX highlights the importance of its xScale product in meeting the growing demand for data center solutions driven by AI, catering to both hyperscaler and retail capacities.

EQIX_2025Q3_2333.speaker: Keith Taylor
EQIX_2025Q3_2333.original_quote: The capacity to be developed now stands at 3 gigawatts, positioning Equinix to serve the expanding market opportunity across hybrid and multi-cloud and AI.
EQIX_2025Q3_2333.summary: Equinix is leveraging its data center capacity of 3 gigawatts to support the growing demand for hybrid and multi-cloud services, specifically in relation to AI applications.

EQIX_2023Q3_2324.speaker: Charles Meyers
EQIX_2023Q3_2324.original_quote: There is a sentiment among customers that they recognize the need to invest in digital transformation and AI, although many are still in the early stages of these efforts.
EQIX_2023Q3_2324.summary: EQIX acknowledges that their customers are increasingly aware of the necessity to invest in digital transformation and AI, indicating a growing market demand for related services.

EQIX_2025Q3_2335.speaker: Adaire Fox-Martin
EQIX_2025Q3_2335.original_quote: We also, as you mentioned, have a very strong presence in terms of AI magnets sitting inside the Equinix ecosystem.
EQIX_2025Q3_2335.summary: EQIX highlights its strong presence in the AI ecosystem by mentioning the integration of AI magnets within its data center infrastructure, indicating a focus on supporting AI workloads.

EQIX_2025Q3_2334.speaker: Nicholas Del Deo
EQIX_2025Q3_2334.original_quote: And what are you doing to actively attract AI magnets like these?
EQIX_2025Q3_2334.summary: The company is focusing on attracting AI-driven companies to its data centers, indicating a strategic initiative to cater to the growing demand from AI businesses.

EQR_2025Q2_2345.speaker: Michael L. Manelis
EQR_2025Q2_2345.original_quote: So I think when you think about the innovation initiatives that we have here, right now, as we think about deploying AI within our portfolio, we're very focused on enhancing the customer experience at the same time optimizing the operations or looking for operating efficiencies.
EQR_2025Q2_2345.summary: EQR is deploying AI to enhance customer experience and optimize operational efficiencies within its portfolio.

EQR_2023Q2_2338.speaker: Michael Manelis
EQR_2023Q2_2338.original_quote: The overall sentiment in the San Francisco market indicates that the tech layoffs are mostly behind us, and there's a lot of momentum around AI, which keeps us optimistic on the continued recovery in this market.
EQR_2023Q2_2338.summary: EQR is observing a positive sentiment in the San Francisco market, attributing part of this optimism to the momentum surrounding AI, which they believe will contribute to the market's recovery.

EQR_2025Q2_2341.speaker: Michael L. Manelis
EQR_2025Q2_2341.original_quote: Our AI leasing application pilots have reduced overall application completion time by over 50%, while significantly improving fraud detection, resident underwriting, and user satisfaction.
EQR_2025Q2_2341.summary: EQR is utilizing an AI leasing application that has halved the application completion time and enhanced fraud detection and resident underwriting, leading to improved user satisfaction.

EQIX_2025Q3_2337.speaker: Adaire Fox-Martin
EQIX_2025Q3_2337.original_quote: So I think all of this speaks to the connectivity narrative and opportunity that Equinix represents and the range of services that Equinix can provide to customers who are considering AI and non-AI-orientated workloads.
EQIX_2025Q3_2337.summary: Equinix is highlighting its role in providing connectivity solutions and a range of services to support both AI and non-AI workloads, emphasizing its strategic position in the data center market.

EQIX_2025Q3_2336.speaker: Michael Funk
EQIX_2025Q3_2336.original_quote: And then second, for you, Adaire, putting your tech hat back on, as you think about distributed AI infrastructure solution and other emerging solutions at Equinix, can you size the addressable market for us for those and how you think about it?
EQIX_2025Q3_2336.summary: The company is discussing its potential in the distributed AI infrastructure market, indicating a focus on emerging solutions that support AI applications.

EBAY_2024Q4_2188.speaker: Jamie Iannone
EBAY_2024Q4_2188.original_quote: 2024 was also a transformative year from an innovation standpoint as our enhanced core AI platform enabled us to launch our first proprietary large language models, boost productivity in key areas like engineering and customer service, and improve the efficacy of search.
EBAY_2024Q4_2188.summary: EBAY is leveraging its enhanced core AI platform to launch proprietary large language models, which are aimed at boosting productivity in engineering and customer service, as well as improving search efficacy.

EQR_2025Q2_2344.speaker: James Colin Feldman
EQR_2025Q2_2344.original_quote: And then you had mentioned earlier, accelerating rollout of AI across the platform.
EQR_2025Q2_2344.summary: EQR is focusing on the accelerated implementation of AI across its platform, indicating a strategic initiative to enhance its operations or services.

EQR_2025Q2_2342.speaker: Adam Kramer
EQR_2025Q2_2342.original_quote: Just wanted to ask about — there have been a few articles recently about sort of AI and sort of the impacts on, call it, entry-level sort of jobs and I think both in sort of types of employment that you would think would be disrupted by AI, but also other types of jobs as well, sort of focusing on t
EQR_2025Q2_2342.summary: The discussion revolves around the potential impacts of AI on entry-level jobs within the real estate sector, highlighting concerns about job disruption due to AI advancements.

EQR_2025Q1_2340.speaker: Michael Manelis
EQR_2025Q1_2340.original_quote: Moving on to updates on innovation and automation, we are expanding our conversational AI capabilities throughout the leasing process.
EQR_2025Q1_2340.summary: EQR is enhancing its leasing process by expanding its conversational AI capabilities, which suggests a focus on improving customer interactions and efficiency in property leasing.

EQR_2025Q2_2343.speaker: Mark J. Parrell
EQR_2025Q2_2343.original_quote: That's a really interesting question, and I think we're in the early innings of determining the impact of AI.
EQR_2025Q2_2343.summary: The company acknowledges that it is still in the early stages of understanding how AI will impact its operations and strategy.

EQR_2024Q2_2339.speaker: Michael Manelis
EQR_2024Q2_2339.original_quote: This past quarter, we began testing a new AI resident assistant that we anticipate could handle 75% of general resident inquiries, including the ability to help residents triage basic service requests and then automatically submit those that require a visit from our service members.
EQR_2024Q2_2339.summary: EQR is testing a new AI resident assistant designed to manage 75% of general resident inquiries, including triaging service requests and automating submissions for service visits.

ESS_2023Q3_2349.speaker: Angela Kleiman
ESS_2023Q3_2349.original_quote: Second, it remains to be seen how the artificial intelligence industry will grow.
ESS_2023Q3_2349.summary: The company is acknowledging the uncertainty surrounding the growth of the artificial intelligence industry.

ERIE_2023Q4_2347.speaker: Tim NeCastro
ERIE_2023Q4_2347.original_quote: And recently, we announced three initial startup investments, Wagmo, which offers tech-enabled pet wellness and insurance; Roots Automation, which leverages artificial intelligence to automate manual and time-consuming insurance processes; and Trust & Will, an online estate planning platform.
ERIE_2023Q4_2347.summary: ERIE is leveraging AI through its investment in Roots Automation, which focuses on automating manual insurance processes, thereby enhancing operational efficiency in the insurance sector.

ESS_2024Q1_2351.speaker: Angela Kleiman
ESS_2024Q1_2351.original_quote: In the West Coast, the tech industry is a primary source of high-paying jobs, and job growth in this industry has led because of evolving business strategies as companies reallocate resources to artificial intelligence opportunities.
ESS_2024Q1_2351.summary: ESS highlights the impact of job growth in the tech industry, attributing it to evolving business strategies focused on artificial intelligence opportunities.

EQR_2025Q2_2346.speaker: Mark J. Parrell
EQR_2025Q2_2346.original_quote: If I could just expand on that because Michael is doing such a good job with all types of technology, including AI on the operation side.
EQR_2025Q2_2346.summary: EQR is utilizing AI technology in its operations to enhance efficiency and effectiveness, although specific applications are not detailed.

ERIE_2024Q2_2348.speaker: Tim NeCastro
ERIE_2024Q2_2348.original_quote: At the same time, we're looking at leveraging the emerging technologies and capabilities related to artificial intelligence.
ERIE_2024Q2_2348.summary: ERIE is exploring the use of emerging technologies and capabilities related to artificial intelligence to enhance their operations.

EL_2025Q2_2357.speaker: Stéphane de La Faverie
EL_2025Q2_2357.original_quote: Hardwiring AI through the organization not only will allow us to become better in supply chain, like I highlighted, but also to use AI to better target consumers with the right assets, but the right media targeting around the world.
EL_2025Q2_2357.summary: The company is integrating AI across its operations to enhance supply chain efficiency and improve consumer targeting through tailored media strategies globally.

EL_2024Q1_2355.speaker: Fabrizio Freda
EL_2024Q1_2355.original_quote: Lastly, we believe we can unlock meaningful cost efficiency from a combination of shorter supply chains, regionalization of our value chain, and improved forecasting accuracy enabled by our new integrated business planning process across the global operation supported by advanced AI capabilities.
EL_2024Q1_2355.summary: The company is leveraging advanced AI capabilities to enhance forecasting accuracy and improve its integrated business planning process, which is expected to lead to significant cost efficiencies through shorter supply chains and regionalization.

ESS_2024Q2_2353.speaker: Angela Kleiman
ESS_2024Q2_2353.original_quote: Real-time data using Placer AI shows a gradual improvement in domestic migration patterns on the West Coast.
ESS_2024Q2_2353.summary: ESS is utilizing real-time data from Placer AI to analyze and track domestic migration patterns on the West Coast, which may inform their investment and operational strategies.

ESS_2024Q1_2352.speaker: Daniel Tricarico
ESS_2024Q1_2352.original_quote: Are you seeing any green shoots from AI companies starting to take office space?
ESS_2024Q1_2352.summary: The analyst is inquiring about potential demand for office space from AI companies, suggesting a growing interest in real estate from the AI sector.

FFIV_2024Q2_2427.original_quote: So far, we have not observed customers making AI a priority yet, as most enterprises are still not allocating substantial budgets to AI at this stage.

FFIV_2023Q4_2412.speaker: Francois Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2023Q4_2412.original_quote: At the macro level, we expect continued application and API growth, fueled by automation efforts and new use cases, including Generative AI.
FFIV_2023Q4_2412.summary: The company is discussing the growth of applications and APIs driven by automation and new use cases, specifically mentioning Generative AI as a key factor.

FFIV_2025Q3_2437.speaker: François Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2025Q3_2437.original_quote: Both are excellent questions, and while it's challenging to make significant predictions at this early stage in the market, I believe AI data delivery is likely to be more immediate for us.
FFIV_2025Q3_2437.summary: The company is discussing the potential of AI data delivery as a significant opportunity, indicating that they see immediate applications for AI in their services.

FFIV_2025Q3_2432.speaker: Cooper Werner
FFIV_2025Q3_2432.original_quote: Systems revenue totaled $181 million, up 39% year-over-year, with strength driven by tech refresh and data center modernization, including customers preparing for AI as well as competitive takeouts.
FFIV_2025Q3_2432.summary: FFIV is experiencing significant revenue growth driven by customers modernizing their data centers in preparation for AI, indicating a strong demand for their systems in this context.

FFIV_2025Q3_2436.speaker: Tomer Zilberman
FFIV_2025Q3_2436.original_quote: Maybe as a follow-up, Francois, on the AI piece, you mentioned that it's still early days as we're awaiting enterprises to really build out these AI factories.
FFIV_2025Q3_2436.summary: The company acknowledges that it is still in the early stages of AI adoption among enterprises, specifically referring to the development of 'AI factories' which indicates a focus on infrastructure for AI capabilities.

FFIV_2025Q4_2440.speaker: François Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2025Q4_2440.original_quote: The accelerated adoption of hybrid multicloud architectures and AI-driven infrastructure is driving demand for advanced application delivery and security solutions, areas where F5 is uniquely positioned to address our customers' most complex challenges.
FFIV_2025Q4_2440.summary: F5 is leveraging AI-driven infrastructure to enhance its application delivery and security solutions, positioning itself to meet the growing demand from customers adopting hybrid multicloud architectures.

FFIV_2025Q4_2442.speaker: Cooper Werner
FFIV_2025Q4_2442.original_quote: A lot of it is really driven by AI that can be both direct and indirect.
FFIV_2025Q4_2442.summary: The company is discussing the influence of AI on its operations, indicating that AI plays a significant role in both direct applications and indirect benefits.

FFIV_2025Q4_2441.speaker: François Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2025Q4_2441.original_quote: This is largely driven by the secular trends we've mentioned, particularly hybrid multicloud and AI, which I can elaborate on later.
FFIV_2025Q4_2441.summary: The company is discussing the influence of AI within the context of hybrid multicloud trends, indicating a strategic focus on integrating AI into their offerings.

FFIV_2025Q3_2433.speaker: François Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2025Q3_2433.original_quote: Our F5 application delivery and security platform is the first in the industry, offering consistent policies, full visibility, and AI-driven insights.
FFIV_2025Q3_2433.summary: F5 is leveraging AI to provide insights and enhance visibility within its application delivery and security platform, positioning it as a leader in the industry.

FFIV_2025Q3_2434.speaker: François Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2025Q3_2434.original_quote: The driving forces behind this growth include ongoing secular trends, particularly revolving around hybrid cloud, data centers, and AI.
FFIV_2025Q3_2434.summary: The company highlights that growth is being driven by trends in hybrid cloud, data centers, and AI, indicating a focus on integrating AI into their broader business strategy.

FFIV_2024Q2_2428.speaker: Francis Pelzer
FFIV_2024Q2_2428.original_quote: We do see AI having a big boost in application demand over the coming years, but it's not something that we expect a ton of revenue in FY '24 from.
FFIV_2024Q2_2428.summary: The company anticipates a significant increase in application demand driven by AI in the coming years, although they do not expect substantial revenue from AI in the fiscal year 2024.

FFIV_2025Q4_2443.speaker: Cooper Werner
FFIV_2025Q4_2443.original_quote: Additionally, we are noticing a new growth vein in data center capacity expansion linked to AI readiness.
FFIV_2025Q4_2443.summary: FFIV is observing growth in data center capacity expansion that is associated with AI readiness, indicating a strategic focus on enhancing infrastructure to support AI applications.

FFIV_2025Q3_2435.speaker: François Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2025Q3_2435.original_quote: Additionally, there is a segment of our hardware business that is influenced not just by tech refreshes, but also by ongoing trends such as hybrid multi-cloud architectures, data center modernization, and growing investments in AI readiness and use cases.

FDS_2023Q3_2445.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2023Q3_2445.original_quote: Earlier this month, we used ChatGPT to produce CallStreet earnings call transcript summaries, reducing summation time by over 90%.
FDS_2023Q3_2445.summary: FDS utilized ChatGPT to generate summaries of earnings call transcripts, achieving a reduction in summarization time by over 90%.

FDS_2025Q2_2448.speaker: Philip Snow
FDS_2025Q2_2448.original_quote: We are seeing robust new business and expansion activity across multiple partner segments, particularly among index providers, exchanges, and AI-focused FinTechs.
FDS_2025Q2_2448.summary: FDS is experiencing strong growth in new business and expansion, particularly with partners in the index provider and AI-focused FinTech sectors, indicating a strategic focus on leveraging AI in financial services.

FDS_2025Q2_2451.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2025Q2_2451.original_quote: So that’s really taking the ability to take what you can do in FactSet to search with AI capabilities and plugging it into your own environment and we’re seeing receptivity for that across all firm types.
FDS_2025Q2_2451.summary: FactSet is integrating AI capabilities into its search functionalities, allowing clients to incorporate these features into their own environments, which has been well-received across various firm types.

FDS_2025Q2_2453.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2025Q2_2453.original_quote: Very often now, we’re constructing agreements where clients can really take value from FactSet any way they want, whether it’s through the desktop, analytics, an API, Gen AI, or some other provider.
FDS_2025Q2_2453.summary: FactSet is enabling clients to derive value from their services through various channels, including generative AI, which suggests a focus on integrating AI capabilities into their offerings.

FFIV_2025Q4_2438.speaker: François Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2025Q4_2438.original_quote: Our growth was driven by data center reinvestment, hybrid cloud adoption and enterprise AI infrastructure demand.
FFIV_2025Q4_2438.summary: FFIV is experiencing growth due to increased demand for AI infrastructure within enterprise settings, particularly in the context of hybrid cloud adoption and data center reinvestment.

FDS_2023Q3_2447.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2023Q3_2447.original_quote: The way we are currently thinking about generative AI is that it will significantly enhance FactSet’s search capabilities, thus improving the end-user experience and allowing us to take additional market share while boosting retention.
FDS_2023Q3_2447.summary: FactSet is leveraging generative AI to enhance its search capabilities, aiming to improve user experience and increase market share and retention.

FDS_2023Q3_2446.summary: The company is exploring the potential impact of generative AI on its revenue model, indicating a strategic interest in how this technology could enhance their offerings or operations.

FDS_2025Q2_2456.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2025Q2_2456.original_quote: So we’re addressing that with the enterprise solutions we have and the Generative AI offerings.
FDS_2025Q2_2456.summary: The company is focusing on its enterprise solutions and incorporating Generative AI offerings to enhance its services.

FDS_2025Q2_2457.speaker: Goran Skoko
FDS_2025Q2_2457.original_quote: And I think some of that in general, I think a lot of the conversations are about our Gen AI tools in that space and the conversations have been good.

FDS_2025Q2_2458.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2025Q2_2458.original_quote: So, I just want to really stress, like for our banking clients the combination of the technology, the integration with office, the Gen AI work we’re doing, as well as the data is just such a powerful combination and obviously it’s a lot to do with the banks wanting to renew with FactSet.
FDS_2025Q2_2458.summary: FactSet is leveraging generative AI technology in conjunction with their data services to enhance offerings for banking clients, which is contributing to client renewals.

FDS_2025Q2_2454.speaker: Goran Skoko
FDS_2025Q2_2454.original_quote: But also, as you see all of these new tech start-ups that are really AI-focused.

FDS_2025Q2_2455.speaker: Helen Shan
FDS_2025Q2_2455.original_quote: This is part of our consistent investment back into the business in technology and Gen AI and funding that through rationalization of cost of our existing expense base.
FDS_2025Q2_2455.summary: FDS is investing in technology and generative AI as part of its strategy to enhance its business, funded through cost rationalization of its existing expenses.

FDS_2025Q2_2452.speaker: Helen Shan

FDS_2025Q4_2469.speaker: Helen Shan

FDS_2025Q4_2472.original_quote: On AI, clearly, it is the biggest opportunity in front of us.

FDS_2025Q4_2476.speaker: Sanoke Viswanathan

FDS_2025Q4_2491.speaker: Helen Shan
FDS_2025Q4_2491.original_quote: I think as we continue, obviously, to invest in AI, that's an important piece of it.

FDS_2025Q4_2488.speaker: Helen Shan

FDS_2025Q4_2488.summary: FDS is utilizing AI to enhance managed services, allowing clients to focus on their core strengths while the company efficiently manages middle office tasks using their technology and AI.

FDS_2025Q4_2492.speaker: Sanoke Viswanathan

HPQ_2024Q2_2901.summary: HPQ is enhancing its digital transformation by accelerating generative AI capabilities, specifically by rolling out AI tools like GitHub Copilot to about 60% of its developers and implementing HP-specific large language models to boost efficiencies in sales and service operations.

IBM_2024Q2_2949.summary: IBM is discussing its AI book of business, which has reached $1.5 billion, indicating a significant focus on AI as a revenue-generating segment within their consulting services.

INTC_2023Q2_3011.summary: Intel is discussing its DGX platform, highlighting its role as a leading-edge AI platform that incorporates CPUs, indicating a focus on integrating traditional processing units with AI capabilities.

INTC_2023Q2_3009.original_quote: We are experiencing the benefits of AI capabilities and improvements in our Gen 4 and subsequent products.

INTC_2025Q2_3021.original_quote: I was wondering if Lip-Bu would mind expanding on his commentary around the AI strategy.

INTC_2023Q1_3002.speaker: David Zinsner
INTC_2023Q1_3002.original_quote: Demand for AI capabilities in the Cloud, across the Network and at the Edge continue to grow, and we're confident that our CPU and Accelerator portfolios are well-positioned to benefit from the market tailwind.
INTC_2023Q1_3002.summary: Intel is discussing the growing demand for AI capabilities in various environments, including Cloud, Network, and Edge, and believes its CPU and Accelerator products are strategically positioned to capitalize on this trend.

INTC_2025Q2_3023.speaker: William Stein
INTC_2025Q2_3023.original_quote: Lip-Bu, I'd also like to lean into this AI topic a little bit because I think you might not have used the words full stack, but that's certainly what it sounds like.
INTC_2025Q2_3023.summary: The analyst is probing into Intel's AI strategy, suggesting that the company may be developing a comprehensive AI solution or platform, referred to as a 'full stack'.

INTC_2025Q2_3022.speaker: Lip-Bu Tan
INTC_2025Q2_3022.original_quote: So I think we're going to unfold our AI strategy in the months to come.
INTC_2025Q2_3022.summary: The company is planning to reveal its AI strategy in the near future, indicating a focus on integrating AI into its operations or product offerings.

INTC_2025Q3_3025.speaker: Lip-Bu Tan
INTC_2025Q3_3025.original_quote: We are still in the early stage of the AI revolution, and I believe Intel can and will play a much more significant role as we transform the company.
INTC_2025Q3_3025.summary: Intel acknowledges its early involvement in the AI revolution and expresses confidence in its potential to play a significant role in the transformation of the company.

INTC_2025Q3_3028.speaker: Stacy Rasgon

INTC_2025Q3_3028.summary: The analyst notes that while AI is driving demand for servers and PCs, customers are still favoring Intel's older products over newer offerings.

INTC_2025Q3_3027.speaker: Lip-Bu Tan
INTC_2025Q3_3027.original_quote: Also, one is the SoftBank investment because they are building up all the infrastructure for AI.

INTC_2025Q3_3031.speaker: Lip-Bu Tan

INTC_2025Q3_3031.summary: Intel is highlighting its leadership in x86 CPU technology and its advancements in AI and accelerated computing, suggesting a focus on integrating AI capabilities into their core semiconductor products.

INTC_2025Q3_3030.speaker: Lip-Bu Tan
INTC_2025Q3_3030.original_quote: This AI will drive a lot of growth, especially in doubly down on Moore's Law.

MTCH_2023Q1_3456.speaker: Bernard Kim

MTCH_2023Q1_3454.speaker: Bernard Kim
MTCH_2023Q1_3454.original_quote: I have tasked our new CTO to work with our leadership team to evaluate emerging technologies like AI, which we believe can be a massive unlock for the category, the same way that the shift to mobile led to the creation of Tinder, which redefined the category just 10 years ago.
MTCH_2023Q1_3454.summary: The company is exploring emerging technologies like AI, believing it could significantly transform their category, similar to how mobile technology enabled the creation of Tinder.

MTCH_2023Q1_3457.speaker: Gary Swidler
MTCH_2023Q1_3457.original_quote: And just picking up on that in terms of expenses, it is kind of early to say what is going to happen from AI in terms of expenses, just because we don't know exactly what kind of efforts are going to be needed.

MTCH_2023Q2_3461.speaker: Bernard Kim
MTCH_2023Q2_3461.original_quote: And with the advent of generative AI and the excitement and enthusiasm that we're seeing across all of our different teams, I've made the call to prioritize generative AI initiatives with Tinder over other initiatives like Coins.

MTCH_2023Q3_3467.original_quote: I view this as a reset of our relationship, and it helps our partnership with Google on many fronts, from marketing to surfacing on their store to promotion of our brands, and then being at the table to really collaborate around innovation, AI, cloud opportunities.

MTCH_2023Q4_3474.speaker: Gary Swidler

MTCH_2024Q1_3476.speaker: Bernard Kim

MTCH_2024Q2_3482.speaker: Gary Swidler
MTCH_2024Q2_3482.original_quote: At Tinder and Hinge where we see significant global growth opportunities, we want to put the right building blocks in place around marketing, product and tech, particularly around AI, given how game-changing we think it can be.
MTCH_2024Q2_3482.summary: MTCH is focusing on integrating AI into their marketing, product, and technology strategies at Tinder and Hinge to leverage significant global growth opportunities.

MTCH_2024Q1_3479.speaker: Bernard Kim

MTCH_2024Q2_3483.speaker: Bernard Kim

MTCH_2024Q3_3484.speaker: Bernard Kim

MTCH_2024Q4_3486.speaker: Gary Swidler

MTCH_2024Q4_3487.speaker: Spencer Rascoff

MDT_2024Q1_3498.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2024Q1_3498.original_quote: And we're decisively allocating capital particularly to our programs and fast-growing markets, as well as focusing our R&D investments on technology megatrends like robotics and artificial intelligence that will drive growth in our industry over the next decade.

MDT_2023Q3_3493.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2023Q3_3493.original_quote: From our AI-enabled surgical planning platform to our patient-specific and differentiated spine implants, to our imaging, navigation, and robotic technologies, we are differentiating ourselves with spine surgeons around the world.
MDT_2023Q3_3493.summary: MDT is utilizing AI in their surgical planning platform and in the development of patient-specific spine implants, as well as enhancing their imaging, navigation, and robotic technologies to differentiate their offerings for spine surgeons globally.

MDT_2023Q3_3494.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2023Q3_3494.original_quote: You’ve got the robot, navigation, interoperative imaging, power instruments, and now, you’ve got this AI-based surgical planning system that basically – we are winning over the hearts and minds of physicians as they see where we are going, and actually a real commitment to changing spine surgery wit
MDT_2023Q3_3494.summary: Medtronic is introducing an AI-based surgical planning system that integrates with their existing robotic and imaging technologies, aiming to transform spine surgery and gain physician acceptance.

MDT_2024Q1_3499.speaker: Geoff Martha

MDT_2023Q4_3496.speaker: Geoffrey Martha

META_2023Q1_3506.summary: META is utilizing AI to enhance user experience by recommending over 20% of content in Facebook and Instagram feeds from accounts and groups that users do not follow, thereby increasing engagement and content discovery.

MDT_2025Q4_3504.summary: Medtronic is leveraging its AiBLE spine ecosystem, which includes AI-driven preoperative planning software, imaging, robotics, navigation, and powered surgical instruments, to maintain a competitive edge with over 10,000 installed units.

META_2023Q1_3508.original_quote: Mark, first one for you is on generative AI and how you think about generative AI and some of the division models and your large language models potentially impacting your long-term advertising business and finding ways to deliver more value for advertisers over the next two, three, five years?
META_2023Q1_3508.summary: META is exploring the impact of generative AI and large language models on its advertising business, aiming to enhance value delivery for advertisers in the coming years.

META_2023Q1_3513.speaker: Mark Shmulik
META_2023Q1_3513.original_quote: In light of all of these technical integrations and AI tools because I think the prevailing view is that privacy will level the playing field, but it certainly doesn't seem that way.

META_2023Q1_3512.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q1_3512.original_quote: And the second part of your question was really, I think, about how AI might drive capital intensity over the next few years.
META_2023Q1_3512.summary: The executive discusses the potential impact of AI on capital intensity, indicating a strategic consideration of how AI could influence investment and resource allocation in the coming years.

META_2023Q1_3514.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q1_3514.original_quote: This includes increasing the volume of ads aimed at on-site objectives and leveraging our AI investments, which have improved our ads' performance and allowed us to introduce new tools and features for advertisers.
META_2023Q1_3514.summary: META is leveraging its AI investments to enhance ad performance and introduce new tools and features for advertisers, focusing on increasing the volume of ads aimed at specific on-site objectives.

META_2023Q1_3510.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q1_3510.original_quote: And as hiring resumes, you'll find the biggest areas that we are hiring in will be to support priority areas like generative AI, ads, infrastructure, Reality Labs, and some of the areas that we've been talking about.
META_2023Q1_3510.summary: META is focusing its hiring efforts on supporting generative AI as a priority area, indicating a strategic commitment to integrating AI into its operations and product offerings.

META_2023Q1_3515.summary: The quote reflects an analyst's inquiry into META's confidence in the long-term sustainability of its business model, particularly in relation to its ongoing efforts in AI and the Metaverse.

META_2023Q1_3518.summary: META is utilizing AI-driven recommendations on Facebook to enhance user engagement within the app.

META_2023Q2_3520.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q2_3520.original_quote: Looking forward, we are optimistic about our ability to increase that value even further by leveraging advanced AI techniques to improve recommendations.

META_2023Q2_3523.summary: META is focusing on open-source initiatives in its core infrastructure, including the design of servers and data centers, as well as advancements in AI.
