PAYC_2025Q3_4297.summary: The company is exploring opportunities to expand its AI product offerings on the IWant platform to serve a wider range of client use cases.

PAYX_2025Q2_4268.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2025Q2_4268.original_quote: Currently, we are benefiting significantly from digital adoption and our enhanced use of AI in our data sets, which is enabling us to drive productivity much more effectively.
PAYX_2025Q2_4268.summary: PAYX is leveraging AI to enhance its data sets, which is driving productivity improvements within the company.

PYPL_2023Q1_4303.speaker: Daniel Schulman
PYPL_2023Q1_4303.original_quote: We have launched full general availability for our mobile checkout using our SDKs and APIs, and we are starting to experiment with AI-powered checkout, which evaluates the entire checkout experience for our merchants.
PYPL_2023Q1_4303.summary: PayPal is experimenting with AI-powered checkout to enhance the overall checkout experience for merchants, utilizing their SDKs and APIs.

PYPL_2023Q1_4302.speaker: Daniel Schulman
PYPL_2023Q1_4302.original_quote: Additionally, our unbranded services have strong relationships with key clients and contribute a significant amount of data to our machine learning and AI systems, which is why we maintain low loss rates and instances of fraud, along with high conversion rates.
PYPL_2023Q1_4302.summary: PayPal is leveraging machine learning and AI systems to analyze data from its unbranded services, which helps maintain low loss rates and instances of fraud while enhancing conversion rates.

PAYC_2025Q3_4298.speaker: Jacob Cody Smith
PAYC_2025Q3_4298.original_quote: We see some AI systems out there that users may use initially, but then go back to how they've operated before.
PAYC_2025Q3_4298.summary: The speaker notes that while some AI systems are being adopted by users, there is a tendency for them to revert to their previous operational methods, indicating skepticism about sustained AI integration.

PYPL_2023Q1_4301.speaker: Daniel Schulman
PYPL_2023Q1_4301.original_quote: For several years, we've been at the forefront of advanced forms of machine learning and AI to combat fraud and implement our sophisticated risk management programs.
PYPL_2023Q1_4301.summary: PayPal is utilizing advanced machine learning and AI to enhance its fraud prevention measures and improve risk management programs.

PYPL_2023Q1_4304.speaker: Daniel Schulman
PYPL_2023Q1_4304.original_quote: There's no question that AI is going to impact almost every function inside of PayPal, whether it be our front office, back office, marketing, legal, engineering, you name it.
PYPL_2023Q1_4304.summary: PayPal acknowledges that AI will significantly influence various functions across the organization, including front office, back office, marketing, legal, and engineering.

PYPL_2023Q2_4307.speaker: Daniel Schulman
PYPL_2023Q2_4307.original_quote: There's no question AI will impact every single company and function just as it will inside of PayPal.
PYPL_2023Q2_4307.summary: The executive acknowledges the pervasive impact of AI across all companies and functions, including within PayPal, but does not specify how it will be applied in their operations.

PYPL_2023Q2_4308.speaker: Daniel Schulman
PYPL_2023Q2_4308.original_quote: Advanced AI checkout will roll out with our first clients later this year, using AI technology as well.
PYPL_2023Q2_4308.summary: PYPL is set to launch an advanced AI checkout feature with its initial clients later this year, leveraging AI technology to enhance the payment processing experience.

PYPL_2024Q1_4312.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2024Q1_4312.original_quote: Additionally, we’re enhancing our risk models and utilizing AI.
PYPL_2024Q1_4312.summary: PayPal is enhancing its risk models by utilizing AI to improve its transaction and payment processing services.

PYPL_2023Q2_4306.speaker: Gabrielle Rabinovitch
PYPL_2023Q2_4306.original_quote: We capture 100% of the data flows, which really is feeding our AI engines and fueling what will be our next-generation checkout.
PYPL_2023Q2_4306.summary: PayPal is leveraging 100% of its data flows to enhance its AI engines, which will support the development of its next-generation checkout system.

PYPL_2024Q1_4311.speaker: Jamie Miller
PYPL_2024Q1_4311.original_quote: We're improving our risk models and utilizing AI more effectively.
PYPL_2024Q1_4311.summary: PayPal is enhancing its risk models by leveraging AI to improve their effectiveness in transaction processing.

PYPL_2024Q1_4310.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2024Q1_4310.original_quote: For example, DraftKings recently went live with our fraud management solution, Fraud Protection Advanced, which combines our intelligence with advanced machine learning and analytics to help businesses protect themselves from ever-evolving fraud threats.
PYPL_2024Q1_4310.summary: PayPal is utilizing AI in its Fraud Protection Advanced solution, which integrates machine learning and analytics to enhance fraud management for businesses like DraftKings.

PYPL_2023Q3_4309.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2023Q3_4309.original_quote: These data points can help us use AI to power a robust shopping recommendation engine to provide more relevant rewards and savings back to our customers.
PYPL_2023Q3_4309.summary: PayPal is utilizing AI to enhance its shopping recommendation engine, aiming to deliver more relevant rewards and savings to customers.

PYPL_2024Q4_4315.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2024Q4_4315.original_quote: Let me start with AI and then maybe hand it over to Jamie.
PYPL_2024Q4_4315.summary: The executive introduces the topic of AI, indicating its importance in the discussion, but does not provide specific details about its application or impact.

PYPL_2025Q1_4316.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2025Q1_4316.original_quote: Regal Cinemas has adopted our fraud protection advance service which allows merchants to leverage PayPal’s decades of fraud intelligence and advance machine learning to improve their risk decisions and capture even more revenue.
PYPL_2025Q1_4316.summary: PayPal is utilizing its machine learning capabilities in its fraud protection service, enabling merchants like Regal Cinemas to enhance risk decisions and increase revenue through advanced fraud intelligence.

PAYC_2025Q3_4293.speaker: Chad Richison
PAYC_2025Q3_4293.original_quote: And our AI initiatives would have cost us for our full capacity opportunity about $25 million a quarter.
PAYC_2025Q3_4293.summary: PAYC is discussing the financial impact of their AI initiatives, indicating that full capacity utilization of these initiatives would have cost approximately $25 million per quarter.

PYPL_2024Q4_4314.speaker: Colin Sebastian
PYPL_2024Q4_4314.original_quote: Can you elaborate on the potential of using AI for improving operational efficiency?
PYPL_2024Q4_4314.summary: The company is exploring the use of AI to enhance operational efficiency, although specific applications or metrics were not detailed.

PYPL_2025Q2_4317.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2025Q2_4317.original_quote: With PayPal's unmatched scale and trusted brands, our strategy is laser-focused on anticipating and fulfilling what customers need today and what they'll expect tomorrow, whether they're buying online, in-store or through AI agents.
PYPL_2025Q2_4317.summary: PayPal is leveraging AI agents to enhance customer interactions and anticipate their needs across various purchasing channels, including online and in-store transactions.

PYPL_2024Q4_4313.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2024Q4_4313.original_quote: We made deliberate investments in AI and automation, which are critical to our future.
PYPL_2024Q4_4313.summary: PayPal is focusing on investments in AI and automation as essential components for its future growth and operational efficiency.

PYPL_2025Q2_4318.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2025Q2_4318.original_quote: At the same time, we are actively shaping the future of commerce through our work in AI, ads and crypto.
PYPL_2025Q2_4318.summary: PayPal is focusing on shaping the future of commerce through its initiatives in AI, although specific applications or products are not detailed.

PAYC_2024Q2_4281.speaker: Chad Richison
PAYC_2024Q2_4281.original_quote: We continue to leverage AI across a wide variety of areas within our organization.
PAYC_2024Q2_4281.summary: PAYC is utilizing AI in various areas within the organization, although specific applications or impacts are not detailed.

PYPL_2025Q3_4321.speaker: Tien-Tsin Huang
PYPL_2025Q3_4321.original_quote: Of course, you've announced a lot of key partnerships like OpenAI today, Perplexity, Google, et cetera.
PYPL_2025Q3_4321.summary: PayPal is discussing its partnerships with AI companies like OpenAI and Google, indicating a focus on integrating AI technologies into its payment processing services.

PYPL_2025Q3_4322.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2025Q3_4322.original_quote: First, on the merchant side, merchants are going to need to figure out how to integrate with each of these LLMs.
PYPL_2025Q3_4322.summary: The company highlights the necessity for merchants to integrate with various large language models (LLMs) to enhance their operations and services.

PYPL_2025Q2_4319.speaker: Jamie S. Miller
PYPL_2025Q2_4319.original_quote: We continue to be very focused on optimizing through AI, through the team and through automation, but that's really how we're thinking about TL.
PYPL_2025Q2_4319.summary: PYPL is focused on optimizing its operations through AI and automation, indicating a strategic approach to enhance efficiency within the company.

PYPL_2025Q3_4320.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2025Q3_4320.original_quote: It also means building for a future where consumers can pay through AI agents powered by Google, OpenAI, Perplexity, and others.
PYPL_2025Q3_4320.summary: PayPal is discussing the integration of AI agents from companies like Google and OpenAI to facilitate consumer payments, indicating a future where AI plays a central role in transaction processing.

PNR_2025Q3_4327.speaker: John Stauch
PNR_2025Q3_4327.original_quote: I do think that it is the time to consider how we're gonna use artificial intelligence, how we're gonna look at our enterprise product technology opportunities, how we're gonna digitize factories, and how we're gonna provide elite customer experiences.
PNR_2025Q3_4327.summary: The company is exploring the use of artificial intelligence to enhance enterprise product technology, digitize factories, and improve customer experiences.

PFE_2023Q4_4328.speaker: Albert Bourla
PFE_2023Q4_4328.original_quote: We are also leveraging AI and other digital tools across the value chain to increase speed and success rates, starting with our fourth-generation PCV vaccine candidate, which recently entered the clinic and received FDA Fast Track designation.
PFE_2023Q4_4328.summary: Pfizer is utilizing AI and digital tools to enhance the development process of their fourth-generation PCV vaccine candidate, aiming to improve speed and success rates in clinical trials.

PYPL_2025Q3_4324.speaker: Darrin Peller
PYPL_2025Q3_4324.original_quote: Thanks, and congrats on the OpenAI and the dividend announcements.
PYPL_2025Q3_4324.summary: The mention of OpenAI suggests that PYPL is engaging with AI technologies, potentially in relation to their payment processing services, although no specific use case or product is detailed.

PYPL_2025Q3_4323.speaker: Alex Chriss
PYPL_2025Q3_4323.original_quote: Now with the partnerships, we've already announced OpenAI, Perplexity, Google.
PYPL_2025Q3_4323.summary: PayPal is discussing its partnerships with AI companies like OpenAI and Google, indicating a focus on integrating AI technologies into its services.

PYPL_2025Q4_4326.speaker: Steven Winoker
PYPL_2025Q4_4326.original_quote: We are also driving process improvements and using AI to leverage our cost base and redirect spending to innovation.
PYPL_2025Q4_4326.summary: PYPL is utilizing AI to enhance process improvements, aiming to optimize their cost structure and reallocate resources towards innovation initiatives.

PYPL_2025Q4_4325.speaker: Jamie Miller
PYPL_2025Q4_4325.original_quote: Our vision is to create a universally trusted catalog that AI agents can access, discover, and transact with safely and securely.
PYPL_2025Q4_4325.summary: PayPal is discussing its vision to develop a universally trusted catalog that AI agents can utilize for safe and secure transactions, indicating a focus on integrating AI into their payment processing ecosystem.

PCG_2023Q2_4329.speaker: Patti Poppe
PCG_2023Q2_4329.original_quote: To name just a few, since 2017, we have installed over 600 high-definition cameras now with AI capabilities, more than 1,400 weather stations and almost 1,400 sectionalizing devices.
PCG_2023Q2_4329.summary: PCG has integrated AI capabilities into over 600 high-definition cameras, enhancing their monitoring systems, alongside the installation of weather stations and sectionalizing devices to improve operational efficiency.

PCG_2023Q2_4331.speaker: Patti Poppe
PCG_2023Q2_4331.original_quote: But back to your question about AI.

PPL_2023Q4_4347.speaker: Vince Sorgi

PFG_2024Q3_4351.speaker: Amy Friedrich

PPL_2024Q2_4349.speaker: Vince Sorgi
PPL_2024Q2_4349.original_quote: First, we will improve the reliability and resiliency of our oil and gas networks through updated design criteria and system hardening to better protect against more frequent and severe storms; through automation, AI and smart grid technology that offers self-healing grid capabilities; through grid-

PG_2024Q2_4352.speaker: Jon Moeller

PG_2024Q2_4352.summary: PG is leveraging AI tools to optimize fill rates and enhance dynamic routing and sourcing, which is expected to yield savings of $200 million to $300 million.

PGR_2024Q3_4355.summary: The company is being asked about its technology deployment, including artificial intelligence, in the context of maintaining staffing levels amid growth and a tight labor market.

PRU_2024Q2_4360.speaker: Charlie Lowrey

PWR_2023Q2_4367.speaker: Duke Austin

PWR_2024Q1_4371.summary: The company highlights the role of artificial intelligence and data centers in driving increased power demand among utilities, indicating a connection between AI adoption and infrastructure development.

QCOM_2023Q1_4375.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q1_4375.original_quote: In handsets, our recently announced Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 mobile platform begins a new era of AI accelerated experiences for smartphones.
QCOM_2023Q1_4375.summary: Qualcomm is introducing the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 mobile platform, which aims to enhance smartphone experiences through AI acceleration.

PGR_2024Q1_4354.speaker: Tricia Griffith
PGR_2024Q1_4354.original_quote: We've been working with machine learning and large language models for over a decade, which has allowed us to implement various tools like a Chatbot that can provide documents without human intervention.
PGR_2024Q1_4354.summary: PGR has been utilizing machine learning and large language models to develop tools such as a Chatbot that automates document provision without human involvement.

PWR_2024Q1_4373.speaker: Auguste Richard
PWR_2024Q1_4373.original_quote: And AI is about to have a huge shift from training, which is very power-intensive to inference, which basically reduces the power consumption by 10%.
PWR_2024Q1_4373.summary: The company is discussing the transition in AI from training to inference, highlighting a significant reduction in power consumption by 10%, which suggests a focus on improving efficiency in AI operations.

PWR_2024Q1_4374.speaker: Duke Austin
PWR_2024Q1_4374.original_quote: We had a solid business before the arrival of AI, with trends like fuel switching, increasing electric vehicle adoption, and the shift towards renewables and away from coal.
PWR_2024Q1_4374.summary: The company acknowledges its existing solid business foundation prior to the advent of AI, focusing on trends like fuel switching and renewable energy, but does not specify how AI is integrated into its operations or strategy.

QCOM_2023Q2_4376.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q2_4376.original_quote: Our next-generation Snapdragon Compute platform, with custom Orion CPUs and industry-leading AI acceleration, is on schedule to enable commercial device launches in 2024.
QCOM_2023Q2_4376.summary: Qualcomm is discussing its next-generation Snapdragon Compute platform, which features custom Orion CPUs and advanced AI acceleration, aimed at enabling commercial device launches in 2024.

PWR_2024Q1_4372.original_quote: Duke, for your longer-term perspective, there has been much discussion lately about AI and data centers.
PWR_2024Q1_4372.summary: The speaker mentions ongoing discussions about AI and data centers, indicating a potential interest in how AI may impact the construction and engineering sector, particularly in relation to data center projects.

QCOM_2023Q2_4377.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q2_4377.original_quote: Cristiano mentioned Edge AI, which will be crucial in Industrial, PC, XR, and other sectors.
QCOM_2023Q2_4377.summary: QCOM is discussing the importance of Edge AI in various sectors including Industrial, PC, and XR, highlighting its strategic relevance across multiple applications.

QCOM_2023Q2_4379.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q2_4379.original_quote: And then with the AI that Cristiano just outlined, that will create an opportunity for us as well.
QCOM_2023Q2_4379.summary: The company is discussing the potential opportunities created by AI advancements as outlined by their executive, indicating a strategic focus on leveraging AI in their operations.

QCOM_2023Q2_4380.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q2_4380.original_quote: The last comment is we are going to become very relevant in AI.
QCOM_2023Q2_4380.summary: Qualcomm is positioning itself to play a significant role in the AI sector, although specific details about their AI initiatives were not provided.

QCOM_2023Q3_4381.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q3_4381.original_quote: Our fastest Snapdragon ever for Samsung defines a new standard in smartphone computing capabilities AI experiences, desktop-level gaming features, professional-grade photography, enhanced mobile productivity, and more.
QCOM_2023Q3_4381.summary: Qualcomm's latest Snapdragon chip for Samsung enhances smartphone computing with advanced AI experiences, enabling features like desktop-level gaming and professional-grade photography.

QCOM_2023Q3_4383.speaker: Stacy Rasgon
QCOM_2023Q3_4383.original_quote: Cristiano, you're talking a lot about AI and how that's going to contribute.
QCOM_2023Q3_4383.summary: The speaker is highlighting Qualcomm's focus on AI and its anticipated contributions, although specific details about products or use cases are not provided.

QCOM_2023Q3_4385.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q3_4385.original_quote: Our approach is to maintain our strategic priorities, make reductions in certain areas, and still have the flexibility to invest in new technologies, particularly in AI, while also continuing our diversification efforts.
QCOM_2023Q3_4385.summary: Qualcomm is focusing on investing in new AI technologies as part of its strategic priorities while also diversifying its offerings.

QCOM_2023Q3_4387.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q3_4387.original_quote: I also want to highlight that we see a new inflection point on the edge with Gen AI.
QCOM_2023Q3_4387.summary: Qualcomm is identifying a significant turning point in edge computing related to Generative AI, suggesting a strategic focus on integrating AI capabilities at the edge.

QCOM_2023Q2_4378.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q2_4378.original_quote: We're very uniquely positioned to do AI in a very high performance and low power across all devices at the edge, and I think that's going to accelerate our diversification strategy across all the new segments.
QCOM_2023Q2_4378.summary: Qualcomm is emphasizing its capability to deliver high-performance, low-power AI solutions for edge devices, which aligns with its strategy to diversify into new market segments.

QCOM_2023Q3_4384.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q3_4384.original_quote: On-device, I think there's a number of reasons AI is developing on devices, a little bit different in the cloud.
QCOM_2023Q3_4384.summary: The company is discussing the development of AI capabilities on devices, highlighting the distinct advantages compared to cloud-based solutions.

QCOM_2023Q4_4392.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q4_4392.original_quote: I think as I said, we probably have one of the best product roadmaps in the history of the company, especially in the Gen AI processing capabilities.
QCOM_2023Q4_4392.summary: Qualcomm is highlighting its strong product roadmap, particularly in generative AI processing capabilities, indicating a focus on developing advanced AI technologies.

QCOM_2023Q4_4389.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q4_4389.original_quote: Key industry trends such as heterogeneous mobile computing and on-device generative AI provide a strong foundation for content growth and expansion to new device categories, driving growth opportunities for Qualcomm.
QCOM_2023Q4_4389.summary: Qualcomm is leveraging trends in heterogeneous mobile computing and on-device generative AI to drive content growth and expand into new device categories.

QCOM_2023Q4_4390.speaker: Samik Chatterjee
QCOM_2023Q4_4390.original_quote: I guess if I can start with Cristiano your comments about on-device AI becoming pervasive in a few years, I think investors are largely looking for more sort of evidence and validation that this is going to be a key focus area for a lot of OEMs smartphones and other device OEM.
QCOM_2023Q4_4390.summary: The speaker highlights the expectation that on-device AI will become increasingly important for OEMs in smartphones and other devices, indicating a focus on integrating AI capabilities into consumer electronics.

QCOM_2023Q4_4388.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q4_4388.original_quote: For example, in the latest Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 smartphone platform, state-of-the-art large language models, such as Llama and Vicuna with up to 10 billion parameters are running at up to 20 tokens per second.
QCOM_2023Q4_4388.summary: Qualcomm is integrating state-of-the-art large language models, like Llama and Vicuna, into its Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 smartphone platform, enhancing its capabilities with advanced AI processing.

QCOM_2023Q4_4393.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q4_4393.original_quote: But not only that, I think it's important to highlight the AI processing capability because that's key to answer your question.
QCOM_2023Q4_4393.summary: Qualcomm is emphasizing its AI processing capabilities, which are crucial for addressing customer inquiries and enhancing product offerings.

PWR_2023Q4_4370.speaker: Gus Richard
PWR_2023Q4_4370.original_quote: The AI data center, not only needs a lot of power, but it needs a lot of bandwidth.
PWR_2023Q4_4370.summary: The company is discussing the requirements for an AI data center, emphasizing the need for substantial power and bandwidth to support its operations.

QCOM_2023Q3_4382.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q3_4382.original_quote: In closing, we remain focused on executing on our vision to bring connectivity, high-performance, low-power computing, and on-device generative AI to the edge.
QCOM_2023Q3_4382.summary: Qualcomm is emphasizing its commitment to integrating on-device generative AI into edge computing solutions, enhancing connectivity and performance while maintaining low power consumption.

QCOM_2023Q3_4386.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q3_4386.original_quote: And to Cristiano's earlier point with generative AI becoming so critical in edge devices going forward, it's going to drive an inflection point in terms of our presence there and our ability to expand content.
QCOM_2023Q3_4386.summary: Qualcomm is emphasizing the importance of generative AI in edge devices, indicating that it will significantly enhance their market presence and content offerings in this area.

QCOM_2023Q4_4395.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q4_4395.original_quote: It has an ASP increase, especially because of the accelerated performance for AI.
QCOM_2023Q4_4395.summary: Qualcomm is experiencing an increase in average selling price (ASP) due to the enhanced performance of its products specifically designed for AI applications.

QCOM_2023Q4_4398.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q4_4398.original_quote: From an ASP perspective, because of all the factors we discussed earlier in the call with the chips becoming way more capable, especially with GenAI, we think we are on a good trajectory to continue to expand our ASP consistent with the last three-year trend.
QCOM_2023Q4_4398.summary: Qualcomm is discussing the impact of generative AI on their chip capabilities, suggesting that advancements in AI technology are contributing to an increase in average selling prices (ASP) for their products.

QCOM_2025Q3_4402.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2025Q3_4402.original_quote: The other one is the head unit for inferencing clusters as AI starts to get scale, and we really look at how we're starting to see inference taking over training.
QCOM_2025Q3_4402.summary: Qualcomm is discussing the development of head units for inferencing clusters, indicating a shift in focus as AI scales and inference begins to dominate over training processes.

QCOM_2023Q4_4397.speaker: Ross Seymore
QCOM_2023Q4_4397.original_quote: Cristiano, you talked about AI at the edge and across a number of different products, whether it’s the PC side, the handset side, etcetera.
QCOM_2023Q4_4397.summary: QCOM is discussing the integration of AI capabilities at the edge across various product lines, including PCs and handsets.

QCOM_2023Q4_4396.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q4_4396.original_quote: Well, and maybe just the other thing to keep in mind is outside handsets, as we talk about the PC opportunity, of course, our AI leadership becomes extremely important there.
QCOM_2023Q4_4396.summary: Qualcomm emphasizes the importance of its AI leadership in expanding opportunities beyond handsets, particularly in the PC market.

QCOM_2023Q4_4394.speaker: Mike Walkley
QCOM_2023Q4_4394.original_quote: Just to follow up on the on-device Gen AI opportunity, how should we think about the increased dollar content per device for Qualcomm or increased ASPs relative to your high-end Snapdragon shipped today?
QCOM_2023Q4_4394.summary: The discussion revolves around the potential for on-device generative AI to increase the dollar content per device and average selling prices (ASPs) for Qualcomm's high-end Snapdragon chips.

QCOM_2025Q3_4404.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2025Q3_4404.original_quote: Consistent with what we have been saying, we're starting to see AI use cases on phones gain traction.
QCOM_2025Q3_4404.summary: Qualcomm is observing a growing adoption of AI use cases specifically on mobile phones, indicating a shift towards integrating AI capabilities into their devices.

PYPL_2023Q2_4305.speaker: Daniel Schulman
PYPL_2023Q2_4305.original_quote: Our initial experiences with AI and continuing advances in our processes, infrastructure, and product quality enable us to see a future where we do things better, faster, and cheaper.
PYPL_2023Q2_4305.summary: PYPL is discussing their initial experiences with AI and how it is enhancing their processes, infrastructure, and product quality, leading to improvements in efficiency and cost-effectiveness.

QCOM_2025Q3_4405.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2025Q3_4405.original_quote: We feel that the company is on the right trajectory, especially as we look for growth and diversification beyond handsets, and AI continues to be a great opportunity for us.
QCOM_2025Q3_4405.summary: Qualcomm is focusing on growth and diversification beyond handsets by leveraging opportunities in AI, indicating a strategic shift towards integrating AI into their business model.

QCOM_2025Q3_4403.speaker: Benjamin Reitzes
QCOM_2025Q3_4403.original_quote: Can I ask for more details about your comments regarding the use of Gemini and Galaxy AI in Android?
QCOM_2025Q3_4403.summary: The company is discussing the integration of Gemini and Galaxy AI into the Android platform, indicating a focus on enhancing user experience through advanced AI capabilities.

QCOM_2023Q4_4399.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q4_4399.original_quote: And really, if you look at our current products and going forward, we think our competitive differentiation is actually accelerating both with our custom CPUs coming into our handset product line and with GenAI in addition to other factors that differentiate us.
QCOM_2023Q4_4399.summary: Qualcomm is emphasizing its competitive edge through the integration of Generative AI (GenAI) into its custom CPUs for handset products, highlighting the role of AI in enhancing their offerings.

QCOM_2023Q4_4391.speaker: Cristiano Amon

RVTY_2025Q3_4466.original_quote: Because I think, you know, not just traditional pharma biotech companies, but also AI focused companies on life sciences will want to correct and create more and more data in order to sort of, you know, look at what modeling capabilities that you need to have, what AI models that you need to build.

HOOD_2024Q2_4475.original_quote: They're an AI-powered investment research platform, and the team is really, really great.

HOOD_2024Q2_4476.speaker: Vlad Tenev
HOOD_2024Q2_4476.original_quote: I would like to add that while we often discuss AI and its impact on various types of companies, we haven't focused as much on how we're using it operationally, particularly in engineering.
HOOD_2024Q2_4476.summary: The company is emphasizing its operational use of AI, particularly within its engineering processes, although specific applications were not detailed.

HOOD_2024Q4_4478.summary: HOOD is leveraging AI technologies to enhance operational efficiency and minimize operational expenditure growth, indicating a focus on productivity improvements through AI integration.

CRM_2024Q1_4552.original_quote: I wanted to circle back to the generative AI discussion, if we could.
CRM_2024Q1_4552.summary: The analyst is seeking further insights into the company's discussions surrounding generative AI, indicating a focus on its potential applications or developments.

CRM_2024Q1_4551.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4551.original_quote: I can't give you the exact date, and it's going to be accelerated by this AI super cycle.
CRM_2024Q1_4551.summary: The company is discussing the impact of an AI super cycle on their operations, indicating that AI advancements will accelerate their initiatives, although specific details and timelines are not provided.

CRM_2024Q1_4553.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4553.original_quote: Well, I think that when you look at our artificial intelligence strategy, which we're discussing with the largest, most important companies and governments in the world, it has to be architected around security, compliance, trust, and governance.
CRM_2024Q1_4553.summary: CRM is focusing on an artificial intelligence strategy that emphasizes security, compliance, trust, and governance, particularly in discussions with major companies and governments.

CRM_2024Q1_4554.speaker: Srini Tallapragada
CRM_2024Q1_4554.original_quote: Everyone is interested in generative AI, and while everybody understands the use cases, they're really worried about trust.
CRM_2024Q1_4554.summary: The company acknowledges the widespread interest in generative AI but highlights concerns regarding trust in its applications.

CRM_2024Q1_4558.speaker: Karl Keirstead
CRM_2024Q1_4558.original_quote: Secondly, you and Brian talked about this reinvestment in R&D and investing heavily around AI.
CRM_2024Q1_4558.summary: The company is heavily investing in research and development focused on artificial intelligence to enhance its offerings.

CRM_2024Q1_4556.speaker: Srini Tallapragada
CRM_2024Q1_4556.original_quote: Where we need more generative image models or something that needs public image databases, we may use a coherent or an OpenAI model.
CRM_2024Q1_4556.summary: The company is exploring the use of generative image models, potentially leveraging OpenAI's technology, to enhance their offerings that require public image databases.

CRM_2024Q1_4555.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4555.original_quote: In January, you published a paper in nature from your research team called large language models, generating functional protein sequences across diverse families—and you really showed something amazing, which was that deep learning language models have shown this incredible promise in various biotec
CRM_2024Q1_4555.summary: The company is leveraging AI through research on large language models to generate functional protein sequences, showcasing the potential of deep learning in biotechnology applications.

CRM_2024Q1_4561.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4561.original_quote: Well, thanks, Kash, for the opportunity to talk about our AI vision, and I'm also going to ask Srini to fill in some details.
CRM_2024Q1_4561.summary: The company is discussing its AI vision, indicating a strategic focus on integrating AI into its offerings, although specific details were not provided.

CRM_2024Q1_4560.speaker: Kash Rangan
CRM_2024Q1_4560.original_quote: Can you just parse for us, if you don't mind, what is new about generative AI as far as Salesforce opportunities are concerned, netting out against what Einstein has been able to accomplish for the company?
CRM_2024Q1_4560.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the advancements and opportunities that generative AI presents for Salesforce, particularly in comparison to the capabilities already provided by their existing AI product, Einstein.

CRM_2024Q1_4557.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4557.original_quote: You developed specific grounding techniques that will keep our customers' data safe and not be consumed by these voracious large language models, which are very hungry for all of our customers' data.
CRM_2024Q1_4557.summary: The company is discussing the development of grounding techniques to ensure the safety of customer data from large language models, highlighting their focus on data protection in the context of AI usage.

CRM_2024Q1_4563.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4563.original_quote: We look forward to seeing you at our AI Day on June 12 in New York City.
CRM_2024Q1_4563.summary: The company is promoting its upcoming AI Day event, which suggests a focus on showcasing its AI initiatives and developments.

CRM_2024Q1_4562.speaker: Srini Tallapragada
CRM_2024Q1_4562.original_quote: The initial version of generative AI will support assistance while remaining grounded and human-in-the-loop.
CRM_2024Q1_4562.summary: CRM is discussing the initial version of their generative AI, which is designed to provide assistance while ensuring human oversight in the process.

CRM_2024Q2_4565.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q2_4565.original_quote: They all see AI CRM as the answer to those priorities, and we're making it easier and faster for our customers to unleash the power of trusted generative AI safely and at scale.
CRM_2024Q2_4565.summary: CRM is positioning its AI CRM as a solution for customer priorities, emphasizing the ease and speed of deploying trusted generative AI for its clients.

CRM_2024Q2_4571.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q2_4571.original_quote: We're focused on investments, especially in AI and data capabilities.
CRM_2024Q2_4571.summary: The company is prioritizing investments in AI and data capabilities to enhance its offerings.

CRM_2024Q2_4570.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q2_4570.original_quote: We’re focused on profitable growth while leveraging opportunities in generative AI and data.
CRM_2024Q2_4570.summary: The company is leveraging generative AI and data to drive profitable growth, although specific applications or products are not detailed.

CRM_2024Q2_4568.speaker: Ariel Kelman
CRM_2024Q2_4568.original_quote: It’s going to be the biggest AI event of the year with a lineup of technical speakers to help businesses understand how to leverage AI in the CRM landscape effectively.
CRM_2024Q2_4568.summary: The company is organizing a significant AI event aimed at educating businesses on effectively leveraging AI within the CRM landscape.

CRM_2024Q2_4566.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q2_4566.original_quote: As you can see in our results, we're progressing towards driving profitable growth and shareholder value, and we are well positioned for the future as the number one AI CRM.
CRM_2024Q2_4566.summary: CRM is positioning itself as the leading AI-driven customer relationship management platform, emphasizing its commitment to profitable growth and shareholder value through AI integration.

CRM_2024Q2_4564.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q2_4564.original_quote: We're also adding a fifth priority: driving our AI transformation.
CRM_2024Q2_4564.summary: The company is focusing on driving its AI transformation as a key priority, indicating a strategic shift towards integrating AI into its operations and offerings.

CRM_2024Q2_4567.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q2_4567.original_quote: AI is about to ignite a buying revolution.
CRM_2024Q2_4567.summary: The company is discussing the transformative potential of AI in driving significant changes in purchasing behavior, suggesting a strategic focus on leveraging AI to enhance sales and customer engagement.

CRM_2024Q2_4569.speaker: Keith Weiss
CRM_2024Q2_4569.original_quote: I want to discuss the balance between investments for the generative AI opportunity versus further margin gains.
CRM_2024Q2_4569.summary: The company is weighing its investments in generative AI opportunities against the potential for further margin improvements.

CRM_2024Q2_4572.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q2_4572.original_quote: We're actively growing our headcount in AI and accelerating our core innovations especially with Data Cloud, while facing normalized attrition.
CRM_2024Q2_4572.summary: CRM is increasing its workforce in AI to enhance its core innovations, particularly focusing on its Data Cloud product.

CRM_2024Q2_4574.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q2_4574.original_quote: We're at the beginning of an AI evolution across four major zones.
CRM_2024Q2_4574.summary: The company is initiating an AI evolution across four major zones, indicating a strategic focus on integrating AI into its operations and offerings.

CRM_2024Q2_4573.speaker: Brad Sills
CRM_2024Q2_4573.original_quote: I want to ask about the impact of AI across Salesforce.
CRM_2024Q2_4573.summary: The analyst is inquiring about how Salesforce is leveraging AI within its operations and product offerings.

CRM_2024Q3_4575.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q3_4575.original_quote: With Einstein now performing 1 trillion transactions weekly and 17% of the Fortune 100 utilizing our Copilot, the excitement around this product is palpable.
CRM_2024Q3_4575.summary: Salesforce's Einstein AI is handling 1 trillion transactions weekly, showcasing its scalability and effectiveness, while 17% of the Fortune 100 companies are using their Copilot feature, indicating strong market adoption.

CRM_2024Q3_4576.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q3_4576.original_quote: As the number one AI CRM, companies in every industry and geography like Fujitsu, Southwest Airlines, and NZ Bank are turning to us as their trusted adviser to help them transform their business for the AI future.
CRM_2024Q3_4576.summary: CRM is positioning itself as the leading AI CRM provider, assisting companies across various industries in their transformation towards an AI-driven future.

CRM_2024Q3_4578.speaker: Kirk Materne
CRM_2024Q3_4578.original_quote: Additionally, is the interest in MuleSoft indicative of a growing interest in AI as people work to organize their data in preparation for the upcoming AI wave?
CRM_2024Q3_4578.summary: The discussion around MuleSoft reflects a growing interest in AI as organizations seek to organize their data effectively in anticipation of AI advancements.

CRM_2024Q3_4581.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q3_4581.original_quote: Right now, I really see areas of investment in AI and Data Cloud.
CRM_2024Q3_4581.summary: The company is focusing its investments on AI and Data Cloud, indicating a strategic direction towards enhancing its offerings in these areas.

CRM_2024Q3_4582.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q3_4582.original_quote: And how do they clean up and harmonize their data first before they start to roll out these AI technologies broadly?
CRM_2024Q3_4582.summary: The company is discussing the importance of data cleaning and harmonization as a prerequisite for the broad rollout of AI technologies, indicating a focus on data quality before implementing AI solutions.

CRM_2024Q3_4584.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q3_4584.original_quote: This AI revolution is a movement towards enhanced productivity, making every customer experience significantly more augmented.
CRM_2024Q3_4584.summary: The company is discussing the impact of AI on enhancing productivity and improving customer experiences, although specific applications or products are not mentioned.

CRM_2024Q3_4585.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q3_4585.original_quote: Exactly what I was going to say, a lot of demand at the top of the funnel for us for new technologies like Data Cloud and like AI, but also seeing some headwinds, no doubt, from our more transactional business, as you stated.
CRM_2024Q3_4585.summary: CRM is experiencing strong demand for its new technologies, including AI and Data Cloud, indicating a focus on integrating AI into their offerings.

CRM_2024Q3_4583.speaker: Mark Murphy
CRM_2024Q3_4583.original_quote: Do you sense that a shift in mentality spilling over a little into the thought process, for example, for Sales Cloud seats or perhaps some excitement sparked by Sales GPT and freeing up some budget there on gen AI that maybe wasn't there six months ago?
CRM_2024Q3_4583.summary: The company is observing a shift in mindset regarding the adoption of generative AI, particularly with their Sales GPT product, which is influencing budget allocations for Sales Cloud seats.

CRM_2024Q3_4577.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q3_4577.original_quote: And we are pioneering the next wave of innovation with data, AI, CRM, and trust.
CRM_2024Q3_4577.summary: The company is positioning itself at the forefront of innovation by integrating data and AI into its CRM solutions, emphasizing trust as a core component of this development.

CRM_2024Q3_4586.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q3_4586.original_quote: Globally, and from my recent experiences in places like San Francisco, Los Angeles, Las Vegas, Stuttgart, and Japan, I've consistently found customers excited about AI, across government and commercial sectors alike.
CRM_2024Q3_4586.summary: The company is observing a strong excitement for AI among customers in various sectors, indicating a growing interest and potential demand for AI solutions.

CRM_2024Q3_4587.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q3_4587.original_quote: Users will have the option to utilize our AI models or integrate their own, which is an impressive feature.
CRM_2024Q3_4587.summary: CRM is offering users the choice to use their AI models or integrate custom AI models, enhancing the flexibility and capability of their platform.

CRM_2024Q3_4580.speaker: Keith Weiss
CRM_2024Q3_4580.original_quote: I wanted to ask about the 17% of the Fortune 500 that are the Einstein GPT Copilot customers.
CRM_2024Q3_4580.summary: CRM is discussing its Einstein GPT Copilot, which is being utilized by 17% of Fortune 500 companies, indicating a significant adoption of their AI-driven product.

CRM_2024Q3_4579.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q3_4579.original_quote: I'm going to have Brian really give you the detail, but what I'll tell you is, you're seeing something that we have been seeing and calling out for the last few quarters, but we probably have not been able to illuminate it to the level that you see now in the numbers, which is that every customer an
CRM_2024Q3_4579.summary: The company is observing a significant trend in customer engagement and satisfaction, which they attribute to their ongoing efforts in AI, although specific details about the AI applications were not provided.

CRM_2024Q4_4592.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q4_4592.original_quote: We are seeing tremendous demand for Data Cloud and AI.
CRM_2024Q4_4592.summary: The company is experiencing significant demand for its Data Cloud and AI offerings, indicating a strong market interest in these technologies.

CRM_2024Q4_4589.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q4_4589.original_quote: With AI and Data Cloud integrated, we are enthusiastic about the momentum of our UE Plus Bundle, now known as Einstein 1 Edition.
CRM_2024Q4_4589.summary: CRM is integrating AI with their Data Cloud to enhance their UE Plus Bundle, now rebranded as Einstein 1 Edition, indicating a focus on AI-driven features within their existing product suite.

CRM_2024Q4_4590.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q4_4590.original_quote: And for fiscal year '25, we expect a non-GAAP operating margin of 32.5% representing a 200 basis point improvement year-over-year, while still making key investments in growth opportunities, notably AI, data and our core businesses.
CRM_2024Q4_4590.summary: The company is making key investments in AI as part of its growth strategy for fiscal year '25, aiming to improve its operating margin while focusing on data and core business areas.

CRM_2024Q4_4593.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q4_4593.original_quote: I do think that there is a lot of excitement to come on AI and data, and we'll see how that plays out this year.
CRM_2024Q4_4593.summary: The company expresses optimism about the potential of AI and data in the upcoming year, indicating a focus on these areas.

CRM_2024Q4_4594.speaker: Keith Weiss
CRM_2024Q4_4594.original_quote: A question just on sort of buying cycles and sort of the timing for this AI goodness to kind of come into the numbers.
CRM_2024Q4_4594.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the impact of AI on the company's financial performance and how it will influence buying cycles.

CRM_2024Q4_4596.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q4_4596.original_quote: Some of the GenAI, it's still early, and given that the adoption curve at really our size and scale as a $38 billion company, we're not factoring in a material contribution from these new products into our FY25 revenue guidance at this time.
CRM_2024Q4_4596.summary: The company acknowledges the early stage of their Generative AI products and is not expecting a significant impact on revenue from these offerings in the upcoming fiscal year.

CRM_2024Q4_4591.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4591.original_quote: If you see anyone else delivering enterprise AI at the same quality, scale, and capability as Salesforce, I would be surprised.
CRM_2024Q4_4591.summary: Salesforce is positioning itself as a leader in enterprise AI, emphasizing the quality, scale, and capability of its AI offerings compared to competitors.

CRM_2024Q4_4595.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q4_4595.original_quote: Our customers have a strong desire to leverage AI capabilities to enhance efficiency, increase margins, and boost productivity.
CRM_2024Q4_4595.summary: The company is discussing how its customers are eager to utilize AI capabilities to improve operational efficiency and profitability.

CRM_2024Q4_4600.speaker: Kirk Materne
CRM_2024Q4_4600.original_quote: I don't know if Brian or Marc wants to take this one, but we realize AI is applicable to every industry.
CRM_2024Q4_4600.summary: The company acknowledges the broad applicability of AI across various industries, indicating a recognition of its potential impact.

CRM_2024Q4_4599.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q4_4599.original_quote: We are implementing our AI technology internally, and our sales teams are utilizing it.
CRM_2024Q4_4599.summary: The company is using its AI technology internally, specifically within its sales teams to enhance their operations.

CRM_2024Q4_4598.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4598.original_quote: When discussing AI, we're all familiar with the term ACV, which essentially originated from us and has now become industry-standard, alongside terms like AOV and CSM, which Brian introduced.
CRM_2024Q4_4598.summary: The company is referencing its influence on industry-standard terms related to AI, indicating its foundational role in the AI space, particularly in metrics like ACV.

CRM_2024Q4_4597.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4597.original_quote: But this is especially crucial amid the transformative wave of artificial intelligence in our industry, which amplifies our need for this data.
CRM_2024Q4_4597.summary: The company emphasizes the importance of data in light of the transformative impact of artificial intelligence in the industry, suggesting a strategic focus on leveraging AI capabilities.

CRM_2024Q4_4601.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4601.original_quote: At the end of the day, we know AI is advancing rapidly.
CRM_2024Q4_4601.summary: The company acknowledges the rapid advancement of AI but does not provide specific details on how it is being utilized or integrated into their products or services.

CRM_2024Q4_4602.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4602.original_quote: This is AI revolution, it's a data revolution.
CRM_2024Q4_4602.summary: The company is emphasizing the transformative impact of AI on data management and utilization, suggesting a significant shift in their approach to leveraging data through AI technologies.

CRM_2024Q4_4588.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4588.original_quote: The industry has also gone through significant changes with the rise of the next generation of artificial intelligence.
CRM_2024Q4_4588.summary: The company acknowledges the significant changes in the industry due to the rise of next-generation artificial intelligence, indicating an awareness of AI's impact.

CRM_2025Q1_4606.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2025Q1_4606.original_quote: As Marc said, we're incredibly well positioned for this AI transformation.
CRM_2025Q1_4606.summary: The company is expressing confidence in its positioning for the ongoing AI transformation, indicating a strategic focus on integrating AI into its offerings.

CRM_2024Q4_4604.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q4_4604.original_quote: We want to be able to deliver Data Cloud and AI at all levels, in all segments.
CRM_2024Q4_4604.summary: The company aims to integrate Data Cloud and AI across all levels and segments of its offerings, indicating a broad application of AI in its services.

CRM_2025Q1_4607.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2025Q1_4607.original_quote: Our new offerings for small and medium businesses, Starter and Pro Suite, which are ready-to-use simplified solutions with AI built in, are building momentum.
CRM_2025Q1_4607.summary: CRM is introducing new offerings for small and medium businesses, specifically the Starter and Pro Suite, which incorporate AI features to provide ready-to-use solutions.

CRM_2025Q1_4605.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4605.original_quote: First is our incredible financial transformation as you can see from the numbers today and the second is the incredible work that's happening with artificial intelligence.
CRM_2025Q1_4605.summary: The company is highlighting its financial transformation alongside the significant advancements being made with artificial intelligence, although specific details about the AI initiatives are not provided.

CRM_2025Q1_4608.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4608.original_quote: The AI transformation is fundamentally changing how we engage with software, as well as the algorithms and data models that underpin AI.
CRM_2025Q1_4608.summary: CRM is discussing the transformative impact of AI on software engagement and the underlying algorithms and data models, indicating a significant shift in their approach to technology.

CRM_2025Q1_4612.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4612.original_quote: As you know, we've integrated these products into a cohesive offering, which enhances our ability to leverage future artificial intelligence.
CRM_2025Q1_4612.summary: The company is discussing the integration of their products to enhance their capability to leverage future artificial intelligence, indicating a strategic focus on AI in their offerings.

CRM_2025Q1_4613.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4613.original_quote: Many newcomers to our industry over the last five to ten years require substantial training and skill development, especially as we embrace new technologies like artificial intelligence, Generative AI, and data capabilities.
CRM_2025Q1_4613.summary: The company acknowledges the need for substantial training and skill development in the industry as it embraces new technologies, including artificial intelligence and Generative AI.

CRM_2025Q1_4610.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4610.original_quote: AI is projected to be our growth driver moving forward.
CRM_2025Q1_4610.summary: The company is positioning AI as a key growth driver for its future business strategy, indicating a strategic focus on AI integration.

CRM_2025Q1_4611.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2025Q1_4611.original_quote: Marc mentioned earlier that 75% of the benefits of Gen AI will come from the front office, and we're currently experiencing that in the demand from our customers and the pipelines we're establishing.
CRM_2025Q1_4611.summary: The company is highlighting the significant impact of Generative AI on front office operations, noting that 75% of the benefits are expected to arise from this area, which is driving customer demand and pipeline development.

CRM_2025Q1_4614.speaker: Kash Rangan
CRM_2025Q1_4614.original_quote: And how confident are you that this generative AI, which is causing an upheaval in that whole tech stack is not something to take lightly?
CRM_2025Q1_4614.summary: The speaker is expressing concern about the significant impact of generative AI on the technology stack, indicating its importance in the industry.

CRM_2025Q1_4609.speaker: Kirk Materne
CRM_2025Q1_4609.original_quote: But I was just kind of curious, when we think about this measured buying environment, is there any sort of crowding effect around AI that's impacting software in your view, meaning when you think about all these companies starting to gear up for this next platform shift.
CRM_2025Q1_4609.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the impact of increased competition in the AI space on software purchases, suggesting a potential crowding effect as companies prepare for a significant shift towards AI technologies.

CRM_2024Q1_4559.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q1_4559.original_quote: Turning to reinvestment, we are keeping a close eye on reinvestment and I’m very excited, particularly about artificial intelligence.
CRM_2024Q1_4559.summary: The company is focusing on reinvestment strategies with a particular emphasis on artificial intelligence, indicating a strategic direction towards leveraging AI in their operations.

SBAC_2024Q2_4616.speaker: Brendan Cavanagh
SBAC_2024Q2_4616.original_quote: We also expect that the eventual incorporation of new Generative AI capabilities into handsets will further increase network consumption.
SBAC_2024Q2_4616.summary: SBAC discusses the anticipated impact of Generative AI capabilities in handsets, suggesting that this will lead to increased network consumption.

CRM_2024Q4_4603.speaker: Michael Spencer
CRM_2024Q4_4603.original_quote: As customers enhance their AI capabilities and deepen their understanding of the economic implications, our pricing will reflect that.
CRM_2024Q4_4603.summary: CRM is discussing how its pricing strategy will adapt in response to customers' growing AI capabilities and their understanding of economic impacts.

SBAC_2025Q1_4621.speaker: Brendan Cavanagh
SBAC_2025Q1_4621.original_quote: As we incorporate AI and other advancements into our solutions, we will seek efficiencies in how we operate these processes.
SBAC_2025Q1_4621.summary: SBAC is integrating AI into their operational processes to enhance efficiency in their solutions.

SBAC_2024Q4_4618.speaker: Brendan Cavanagh
SBAC_2024Q4_4618.original_quote: Fixed wireless access, the incorporation of next-gen AI applications and handsets, regulatory buildout requirements, and remaining 5G coverage expansion are expected to contribute to ongoing network investments.
SBAC_2024Q4_4618.summary: SBAC is discussing the incorporation of next-generation AI applications in their fixed wireless access and handsets, indicating a focus on enhancing their network capabilities through AI technology.

SBAC_2024Q4_4620.speaker: Brendan Cavanagh
SBAC_2024Q4_4620.original_quote: We do believe there will be a positive impact from the integration of generative AI functionalities into handsets.
SBAC_2024Q4_4620.summary: SBAC is discussing the potential positive impact of integrating generative AI functionalities into handsets, suggesting a focus on enhancing mobile technology.

SBAC_2024Q4_4619.speaker: Ric Prentiss
SBAC_2024Q4_4619.original_quote: But when you think about AI, you touched on in your opening remarks, when and how will AI affect towers?
SBAC_2024Q4_4619.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the potential impact of AI on telecom towers, suggesting a focus on how AI could enhance operations or services related to tower management.

SBAC_2024Q3_4617.speaker: Brendan Cavanagh
SBAC_2024Q3_4617.original_quote: Other growth drivers, which we have discussed before, such as fixed wireless access, the incorporation of new generative AI capabilities into handsets, regulatory build-out commitments and remaining 5G coverage expansion will all contribute to a healthy network investment environment over the next s
SBAC_2024Q3_4617.summary: SBAC is discussing the incorporation of generative AI capabilities into handsets as a growth driver, which suggests a focus on enhancing user experience and functionality in telecommunications.

SLB_2023Q4_4623.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2023Q4_4623.original_quote: And I think this relates to the adoption of Delfi, indeed, adoption of a number of users, the use of cloud compute on our Delfi platform and the use of additional hedge or AI capability that we offer to customers.
SLB_2023Q4_4623.summary: SLB is discussing the adoption of their Delfi platform, which incorporates cloud computing and AI capabilities to enhance user experience and provide additional features for their customers.

SLB_2023Q4_4622.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2023Q4_4622.original_quote: As a result, we achieved full year digital revenue of more than $2 billion with our new technology platforms comprised of cloud, edge, and AI, growing at a CAGR of 60% since 2021.
SLB_2023Q4_4622.summary: SLB reported over $2 billion in digital revenue for the year, highlighting the significant growth of their technology platforms that integrate cloud, edge, and AI, which have achieved a compound annual growth rate of 60% since 2021.

SLB_2024Q1_4624.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q1_4624.original_quote: In this context, there are certain priorities that are increasingly critical to our customers: project life-cycle reduction, particularly in exploration & appraisal to accelerate time to first gas or first oil; capital efficiency in the development phase to set new benchmarks in every basin; steps t
SLB_2024Q1_4624.summary: SLB is focusing on reducing project life-cycle times and enhancing capital efficiency for their customers, particularly in exploration and appraisal phases, to accelerate time to first gas or oil.

SLB_2024Q2_4626.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q2_4626.original_quote: Finally, underpinning nearly everything we do is the power of digital and AI.
SLB_2024Q2_4626.summary: SLB emphasizes the foundational role of digital technologies and AI in their operations, suggesting a broad integration across various aspects of their business.

SLB_2024Q1_4625.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q1_4625.original_quote: You will see ongoing announcements related to digital operations, cloud adoption for geoscience workflows, and in data and AI, reflecting the variety of what we've introduced this quarter.

SLB_2024Q3_4628.original_quote: But for next year, but digital uptake is accelerating and the quality of the digital uptake, not just going to the cloud, but also using all the AI tools is accelerating as well.

SLB_2024Q3_4627.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q3_4627.original_quote: This is presenting opportunities for high margin growth, and we have taken a leading role in this space, partnering with our customers to accelerate their transition to the cloud, scaling new technology for drilling and production operations, and creating new markets by delivering disruptive solutio
SLB_2024Q3_4627.summary: SLB is leveraging AI to partner with customers in transitioning to cloud technologies, enhancing drilling and production operations, and creating new markets through disruptive solutions.

SLB_2024Q3_4630.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q3_4630.original_quote: And finally, the third leg of growth in our digital portfolio is the emergence of new data and AI capability, as you have seen, the Lumi that we have put in place.

SLB_2024Q3_4631.speaker: Kurt Hallead

SLB_2024Q3_4631.summary: SLB is engaging with potential clients to gather insights on their generative AI product, indicating a focus on understanding market needs and refining their AI offerings.

SLB_2024Q4_4635.original_quote: Our customers continue to embrace the power of cloud computing, AI, and digital operations to shorten cycle times and improve operating efficiencies.
SLB_2024Q4_4635.summary: SLB highlights that its customers are leveraging AI and digital operations to enhance operational efficiencies and reduce cycle times in their processes.

SLB_2024Q3_4633.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q3_4633.original_quote: Our ability to not only participate fully but also gain share in this market and unlock white space in this market, such as with Lumi data and AI, and offer edge autonomous operation, I think will create a long growth opportunity that will be largely uncorrelated.
SLB_2024Q3_4633.summary: SLB is leveraging AI through its Lumi data platform to enhance edge autonomous operations, aiming to unlock new market opportunities and gain market share in the oil and gas sector.

SLB_2024Q3_4634.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q3_4634.original_quote: Hence, the operation of Lumi as a platform to address customers that are more interested in unlocking data and directly accessing AI through a data platform as opposed to having to adopt the full suite.
SLB_2024Q3_4634.summary: SLB is discussing the Lumi platform, which allows customers to unlock data and access AI capabilities directly through a data platform, rather than requiring them to adopt a comprehensive suite of services.

STX_2023Q3_4640.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q3_4640.original_quote: We create more data continually through videos, communications, AI, and other mediums, all of which require storage.
STX_2023Q3_4640.summary: STX highlights the increasing demand for storage solutions driven by the continuous generation of data from various sources, including AI.

STX_2023Q4_4641.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q4_4641.original_quote: We also believe the timing for demand recovery could be affected by spending priorities focused on accelerating the build-out of compute-intensive AI infrastructure.
STX_2023Q4_4641.summary: STX is discussing the impact of spending priorities on the build-out of compute-intensive AI infrastructure, indicating a focus on enhancing their capabilities to support AI demands.

SLB_2024Q4_4636.speaker: Stephane Biguet
SLB_2024Q4_4636.original_quote: On a full year basis, Digital revenue of $2.44 billion grew 20% year-on-year, supported by close to 35% growth from Cloud, AI, and Edge technology.

RCL_2024Q4_4514.original_quote: We also infused AI into the guest journey to provide a better, more efficient experience and more personalized service.

SLB_2024Q4_4639.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q4_4639.original_quote: Customers are keen to connect their datasets and unlock data insights using our AI platform.
SLB_2024Q4_4639.summary: SLB is discussing how their AI platform enables customers to connect datasets and derive insights, highlighting the platform's role in enhancing data utilization.

STX_2023Q4_4643.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q4_4643.original_quote: So that’s AI and that’s a high priority for cloud service providers and people doing stuff on-prem as well.

SLB_2024Q4_4637.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q4_4637.original_quote: We believe the market leadership we have taken, our platform approach, and our first-mover advantage in Cloud and AI will enable robust growth in the years to come, outpacing overall industry growth.

SLB_2024Q3_4632.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q3_4632.original_quote: So, if take away, I think, at a high level, I think, customers realized that we are more than just one geoscience application on the cloud, and we have a digital value proposition that expands across different domains and across different technology stack on-prem, cloud, edge AI, and across the diff
SLB_2024Q3_4632.summary: SLB is emphasizing its digital value proposition that integrates AI across various domains and technology stacks, including on-premises, cloud, and edge AI solutions, showcasing its comprehensive approach beyond a single geoscience application.

SLB_2024Q4_4638.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q4_4638.original_quote: Finally, we are unlocking a new market with our Lumi™ platform connecting unstructured data and datasets from exploration and production workflows, which supports customer access to AI capabilities.
SLB_2024Q4_4638.summary: SLB is leveraging its Lumi™ platform to connect unstructured data and datasets from exploration and production workflows, enhancing customer access to AI capabilities.

STX_2023Q4_4642.original_quote: Now, Dave, I just wanted to ask if you could flesh out the comment you made in your prepared remarks about the timing of a demand recovery being delayed by AI investments.
STX_2023Q4_4642.summary: The company is discussing how investments in AI are impacting the timing of demand recovery, indicating a strategic consideration of AI's influence on market dynamics.

STX_2023Q4_4646.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q4_4646.original_quote: And I think to the questions about generative AI and other feature sets, we’re not at peak cloud yet.

STX_2023Q4_4647.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q4_4647.original_quote: However, we remain excited as ever for the long-term opportunities for mass capacity storage, and it’s brought about by existing and emerging trends that are underpinned by data like AI, like we talked about today.
STX_2023Q4_4647.summary: The company is discussing the long-term opportunities in mass capacity storage driven by trends related to data and AI, indicating a focus on how AI influences storage needs.

STX_2023Q4_4645.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q4_4645.original_quote: There are some generative AI discussions that are very transactional and probably don’t need a whole lot of HDD and then there are a lot that are very video-intensive and want data to be sequestered in a certain tank so that nothing else can touch it.
STX_2023Q4_4645.summary: The company is discussing the varying storage needs for generative AI applications, highlighting that some applications are transactional and require less HDD, while others, particularly video-intensive ones, necessitate specialized data storage solutions.

STX_2023Q4_4644.speaker: Kurt Swartz
STX_2023Q4_4644.original_quote: Open to delve into generative AI implications for both HDD and SSD demand.

STX_2024Q2_4655.speaker: Dave Mosley
